SA14n1187:24: na hi prayojanamantareṇa prekṣāvān kvacit pravartate |
SA14n1187:30: tadanantaraṃ pūrvāparayuktivirodhāpanodanāya codakaṃ prati samādhānaṃ vakṣyata ityeva nyāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:39: vajrasya hi ubhe śikhare sthūle madhyaṃ ca sūkṣmam |
SA14n1187:40: tathaiveyaṃ prajñāmitā'pyādāvadhimukticaryābhūmim ante ca buddhabhūmiṃ vistareṇa nirdiśati |
SA14n1187:51: taccāpi evaṃ mayā śrutam ityārabhya tena khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ ityetāvatparyantaṃ deśitam |
SA14n1187:55: aprastutābhidhānena sarvam asamañjasaṃ syāditi tannirākartuṃ sarvatrāpi prakaraṇena yojyam |
SA14n1187:58: āryasubhūtinā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhavaṃśānupacchedakatvena viditvā yathā buddhavaṃśānupacchedo bhavet tathaivādau saṃsthāpitā |
SA14n1187:61: tasya pratipattilakṣaṇasya sthānaṃ tāvat kasmin viṣaye bodhisattvena sthātavyam ?
SA14n1187:65: tadapi iha subhūte ! bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena evaṃ mayā ityādinārabhya tārakā timiram ityantimagāthāṃ yāvadabhihitam |
SA14n1187:66: pratipattilakṣaṇaṃ tasya sthānaṃ cetyetābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bodhisattvānāmaśeṣakaraṇīyaparipūrṇatā samprakāśitā,
SA14n1187:69: padārthādayaśceme sāmpratamabhidhīyante- tatra evam iti śabdo'bhyupagamādinānārtheṣu dṛśyate |
SA14n1187:80: ekasmin kāle idaṃ śrutamanyadā anyadapi śrutamiti darśyate |
SA14n1187:81: atha vā, ekasmin samaye bhagavān viharati sma ityuttareṇa sambadhyate |
SA14n1187:82: aparimitāvineyānāṃ teṣāṃ hitāya anyadā anyatra viharati sma iti pratipādyate |
SA14n1187:83: kleśa - skandha - mṛtyu - devaputrarūpāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ bhañjakatvānnirūktayā bhagavān iti smaryate |
SA14n1187:84: atha vā īśvaryādimattvāt ' bhagavān ' ityucyate | yathoktam -
SA14n1187:86: jñānasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhaga iti śrutiḥ ||
SA14n1187:90: tadyathā caityabhūtaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati ityatrāpyuktam |
SA14n1187:92: lokapratyāyanārthaṃ tāvat [ sa ] pradeśaḥ sākāraḥ samṛddhaścetyuktaḥ ,
SA14n1187:93: evaṃ sati paraiḥ grāhyaṃ bhavati vacanam ,
SA14n1187:95: śrāvastīpradeśasya atyantaṃ vistīrṇatvāt kutra viharatīti sthānaniścayābhāvād jetavane ityuktam |
SA14n1187:97: tadapi tāvat kasyacidaprasiddhamiti sambhāvanāyām anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme ityuktam |
SA14n1187:98: gṛhapati - anāthapiṇḍada ityanāthebhyo dayayā piṇḍadānena tathā prasiddhaḥ,
SA14n1187:99: sa khalu bhagavadarthaṃ nirantarayā ratnāni vikīrya jetuḥ rājaputrādārāmaṃ krītavān |
SA14n1187:103: athavā śrāvastītyanena bahunāṃ madhye viharaṇāt parārthasampadabhihitā |
SA14n1187:106: atra kaḥ sākṣīti cintyamāne mahatābhikṣusaṃghena ityuktam |
SA14n1187:108: mārādibhiḥ pratyarthibhirabhedyatvāt teṣāṃ samūhaḥ saṃghaḥ ityucyate |
SA14n1187:115: bhikṣusaṃghāt bodhisattvānāṃ bāhulyaṃ tu teṣāmevārthāya sūtrāṇāṃ bhāṣitatvāt |
SA14n1187:130: tatra bhikṣusaṃghastu kṛtakṛtyatvād mṛdukāruṇikatvācca sarvakālaṃ tathāgatasya pādāntike niṣadyata iti viditvā syāsnutvasaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvamuktaḥ |
SA14n1187:132: adhimātrakaruṇayā jagadarthakaraṇāya lokadhātuṣu viharaṇāt sarvakālaṃ bhagavataḥ pādāntike'niṣīdanācca paścāduktāḥ |
SA14n1187:140: kālaniyatatvaṃ tu asminneva kāle piṇḍapāto grahītavya iti,
SA14n1187:141: tadapi kimiti aparijñānāt tadarthaṃ pūrvāhṇaḥ iti vacanenābhidhīyate |
SA14n1187:143: upavasatāṃ pravajitānāṃ ca piṇḍakālopalambhena pūrvāhṇalakṣaṇaṃ bhagavatā deśitamekāntenetyavabodhanārthaṃ kālasamaye ityuktam |
SA14n1187:145: bhagavatā svecchayā kṛtamiti sambhāvyamānatvād etat padatrayamuktamiti vā |
SA14n1187:148: anyathā svasyaiva vineyatvābhāve kathaṃ parasya vineyatā syāt |
SA14n1187:149: cīvaramādāya ityatra cīvarādānaṃ tāvat prāvaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam,
SA14n1187:157: vividhavismayahetūnāmanavarataṃ pradarśanena bhagavati ca pareṣāṃ prasādotpādanārthaṃ ityetānyaparimitāni prayojanānyavagantavyāni |
SA14n1187:158: kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ iti yaḥ khalu bhojanādibhaktakṛtyaṃ sampāditavān,
SA14n1187:160: alpakuśalamūlebhyo nirjātā api brahmādayaḥ kavalīkārāhāravināgānnaiva bhaktakṛtyaṃ kurvanti,
SA14n1187:163: tathā āryadharmasaṃgītau api bhāṣitam “tathāgatastu kṣutpipāsāvarjitaḥ mūtrapurīṣavirahito'kṣīṇakāyaśca bhavati“ iti |
SA14n1187:164: satyamevaitat tathāpi yadi bhagavataḥ sa kāyo na paramārthabhūtaḥ,
SA14n1187:169: manuṣyabhāve eva vīryārambheṇa etādṛśamanuttarapadaṃ labhyata iti vineyānāmutsāhanārthaṃ manuṣyabhāvaṃ darśayitvā evaṃrūpaṃ piṇḍabhaktaṃ darśitavān |
SA14n1187:170: ye dāyakā dānapatayaḥ teṣu piṇḍaparikarmaprakāśanena praharṣaḥ samupajāyate |
SA14n1187:171: bhāgyavanto'pi kiñcitkarmāvaraṇavaśāt pretādiṣu samupajātāḥ mahaujaskā yakṣādayaḥ bhagavatāṃ karanakhāmṛtena saṃspṛsṭaṃ paramākṣayadivyarasamādāya paribhuñjānāḥ paramasukhasaṃtṛptacetasa uttamāṃ samādhiṃ samavāpnuvanti |
SA14n1187:175: sarvamādāya tadanu yat piṇḍapātaṃ bhaktaṃ tat paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātam |
SA14n1187:179: athavā paścāditi yad dvitīyavāramādānaṃ tat paścādbhaktam |
SA14n1187:181: athavā apārahṇabhaktatvena yaḥ paribhujyate piṇḍaḥ sa evamucyate |
SA14n1187:182: ataśca dhūtaguṇavattvāt vikālabhojanaparihṛtatvācca tadviorahitametad bhaktaṃ syādityarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:185: kintu pravrajitāstu svayamevānutiṣṭhanta iti nidarśayituṃ bhagavatā svayaṃ pātracīvarapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ kṛtam,
SA14n1187:188: kriyāntrādyadhimuktasattvāśayānuvartanaṃ vā sarajaskapādābhyāṃ śayanāsanānāmanavamardanam iti śikṣāyāmādaraṃ darśayituṃ pādaprakṣālanaṃ draṣṭavyam |
SA14n1187:191: kathaṃ dharmadeśanākāle bhagavān samāhitena īryāpathena nyaṣīdaditi cet ?
SA14n1187:192: samāhitaireva dharmo'yaṃ jñātuṃ śrotuṃ vā śakyate nānyairiti samādhau yatnotpādāya lokāanāṃ pravartanāt |
SA14n1187:193: pratomukhīṃ smṛtimupasthāpya iti pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ tāvad anuttarapadaṃ prāpya yathā buddhavaṃśānupacchedaḥ syāttathāhaṃ kariṣye iti yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tat praṇidhānaṃ smaraṇābhimukhīkṛtamityarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:194: bhagavāṃstu buddhaḥ sadā samāhitaḥ sannapi sarvathā smṛtau viharati |
SA14n1187:197: samaye smareṇanāpi bhagavataḥ sadā samāhitatvaṃ na virudhyate |
SA14n1187:198: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ ityanena kimuktam ?
SA14n1187:199: yatparimāṇena bhikṣusaṃghena saha bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma,
SA14n1187:200: sa sarvaḥ dharmadeśanākāle tatra naiva sannipatitaḥ |
SA14n1187:205: loke prāyaḥ samānyapūrvakaṃ viśeṣaḥ sthāpyata iti lokaprasiddhyanurūpamubhayamāha |
SA14n1187:212: nairātmyadvayamārgeṇa samyag gata iti suṣṭhurūpeṇa gataḥ sugataḥ surūpavaditi |
SA14n1187:219: rājādayo'pi āśritān prajādīn yathāśakti anuparigṛhṇanti kintvatra bhagavati āścaryamityāśaṅkākāyāṃ kimāścaryamiti tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ityuktam |
SA14n1187:221: athavā yathā pūrvakā nairātmyadva rgeṇa gatāḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇamadhigatāḥ,
SA14n1187:229: bhagavatastāvat tathāgatatvenārhattvena samyagabhisambuddhya adhigatāśeṣasampattitayā yo'nugrahaḥ sa khalvatra āścaryamityādarśitam |
SA14n1187:230: ṛte karuṇāṃ bhagavato'nugrahe'smin nāsti kiñcidanugrahakāraṇāntaramityanenābhihita eva bhavati bhagavān mahākāruṇikaḥ |
SA14n1187:231: anuparigṛhītāḥ iti abhisambuddhena bhagavatā dharmacakrapravartanākāle paripakvakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā bhūmiṣvavatāritāḥ,
SA14n1187:233: parīnditāḥ iti aparipakvakuśalamūlānām ādikarmikāṇāmanugrahāya ta eva parīnditāḥ,
SA14n1187:263: tatra prajñāpāramiteyaṃ kathaṃ buddhavaṃśasya anupacchedaṃ karotīti sandehakāriṇāṃ saṃśayopacchedanārtham |
SA14n1187:279: vikṣepanigrahastāvat samādhito vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepebhyo nivārya tatraiva viniyojanam |
SA14n1187:286: suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru samyaktayā udgrahītumudyukto bhava ityarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:290: anyathā avāṅmukha-aśuci-sacchidrabhāṇḍeṣu ambuvṛṣṭiriva dharmavṛṣṭirapīyaṃ nirarthakaiva syādityarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:291: athavā ahaṃ tu kevalaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tvameva tāvad yatnataḥ pratipadyasvetyarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:294: tacca daśabhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ daśabhiśca bhūmibhiḥ parigṛhyate |
SA14n1187:297: bodhisaṃprasthitena ityetāvaducyamāne bodhīnāṃ tritvādanyasyā api bodheravagamaḥ syāditi |
SA14n1187:317: aho, ārabdhavīryo'yamiti pareṇa jñāyamāne sati śraddhāmāgamya lābhasatkārādhyavasitatvam |
SA14n1187:318: tasmād bodhisattva etebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vimucya prajahyāt |
SA14n1187:326: yatra bodhisattvena sthātavyaṃ pratipattavyaṃ cittaṃ ca pragrahītavyamiti |
SA14n1187:331: sarvasattvaparinirvāpaṇacittamutpādya pāramitāyogī tāvat tathāgatasya rūpakāya-dharmakāyaprāptau chandamutpādayati |
SA14n1187:332: tataḥ ā abhimānam antimam ahaṃ-vikalpaṃ yāvadabhisamayastāntarāyebhyaścittaṃ viprakarṣate |
SA14n1187:342: athāpi sattvaḥ sattva iti yastatsvabhāvaḥ taditaravyāvṛttaśabdādhyāropitārthasabhāgarūpeṇa khyātaḥ sa eva sattvena saṃgṛhyate |
SA14n1187:345: evaṃ sāmānyato nirūpya viśeṣato darśayitumāha- aṇḍajāḥ ityādi |
SA14n1187:352: bṛhatphalasyaikadeśaṃ bhavāgrajāṃścaṃ sattvān vihāya sarve sattvāḥ saṃjñinaḥ |
SA14n1187:359: 'sarve dharmāḥ niḥsattvāḥ' ityanena saha vacanasyāsyāvirodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ |
SA14n1187:360: atra sattvadhāturiti sāṃvṛte satye sattvadhātustaṃ darśayituṃ yāvān ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:369: praṇītaphale saṃvidyamāne kṛpālūnāṃ hīnaphalārthitā na khalu yuktimatī |
SA14n1187:370: saṃvidyamāne'pi praṇītaphale prāptumaśakyatvādevaṃ prārthyata iti cet ?
SA14n1187:371: tvanmatānusāraṃ tāvad trividhagotratvādagotratvācca sarvaiḥ hīnaphalamapi prāptuṃ naiva śakyate |
SA14n1187:374: saṃvidyamāneṣvapareṣu parārthakāriṣu buddhabodhisattveṣu nirarthakena mayā'tra praṇidhānena kimiti vicārān santyajya parapratyayatāṃ ca dūrīkṛtya mahākaruṇārdraḥ jājvalyamānena duḥkhāgninā pīḍyamānaṃ jagad vilokya ahameva tārayiṣyāmīti cintayamānaḥ praṇidadhāti | yathoktam-
SA14n1187:378: tathāpi priyaputrasya nṛpatvāya praṇidhānamiva satyapyaprāpye praṇītaphale kathanna praṇidhānamiti |
SA14n1187:395: nikhilasattvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇāśayena anena ādāryaṃ tāvad bodhicittasyādarśitam |
SA14n1187:397: kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti taddeśayitumāha evam ityādi |
SA14n1187:398: saṃvṛtau sarvasattvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇe'pi yathā paramārthato na ko'pi sattvaḥ bodhisattvenopalabhyate,
SA14n1187:400: vyutthito bhūtvā na paramārthataḥ ko'pi sattvo mayā parinirvāpitaḥ iti yaścittotpādastena gambhīratvaṃ paramārthabodhicittatvañca darśitaṃ bhavati,
SA14n1187:402: tena vikṣepanigraheṇa kathamatra cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityādarśayitumāha- tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:404: atha yaḥ pudgalādisaṃjñayā pravartate kiṃ sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ ?
SA14n1187:405: sattva ityuktau punaḥ kasya hetoḥ iti praśnenetarābhirapi (saṃjñābhiḥ)
SA14n1187:407: asyāyamabhiprāyaḥ- kumatibhistāvat pañcaskandhātiriktaḥ antarvyāpāravāṃścaturṇāṃ bhogānāṃ bhoktā ekaḥ puruṣa iti parikalpyate sattvaḥ,
SA14n1187:409: ye cānirvacanīyatvena pudgalamicchanti tairapi tasya skandhasvabhāvavilakṣaṇatvenābhyugatatvāt tadbalenārthāntara evābhyupeyate |
SA14n1187:412: tatsādhakapraṇābhāvād bādhakasadbhāvācca taddraṣṭā bodhisattvo viparītābhiniveśena viparyasta eva bhavati |
SA14n1187:413: yaḥ khalu viparyastaḥ sa kathaṃ paramārthabodhisattvaḥ ?
SA14n1187:415: tathā hi-bandha-mokṣa-mārga-hetuphalasambandhasmṛtipratyabhijñādīnāmekādhikaraṇakatve tāvat prasiddhe nairātmyavādināṃ yuṣmākaṃ mate tu yastadādhāra ekaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa nāsti kaściditi kastāvadādhāraḥ ?
SA14n1187:417: baddho devadattaḥ muktaścānyo yajñadatta iti naiva vyavasthā,
SA14n1187:418: na cānyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalamityatiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA14n1187:420: tathā hi- kartṛtvena prajñapto yo hi vijñānakṣaṇaḥ,
SA14n1187:422: akartuścaiva tasya phalena yogādakṛtābhyāgamo doṣaḥ syāt |
SA14n1187:423: smṛtyādikaṃ a bhinnādhikaraṇakamiti na loke pratītam |
SA14n1187:426: devadattasya cittānubhavaḥ yajñadattacittena na smaryate vā pratyabhijñāyate vā |
SA14n1187:427: yenānubhūyate tenaiva smaryate pratyabhijñāyate veti prasiddham |
SA14n1187:433: tatra yadi svatantrasyaikasya paramārthasato nityasya puruṣasyādhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyate,
SA14n1187:434: tadā tathāvidhena puruṣeṇa saha kvāpi hetoḥ sambandhāsiddheranaikāntikatvam,
SA14n1187:441: api ca, yadā yatra santāne'vidyādikaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ pravartate,
SA14n1187:443: sa eva punaḥ śrutamayādikrameṇāryamārgotpādād avidyādinirodhenāśrayaparāvṛttau muktaḥ ityupacaryate |
SA14n1187:444: ubhāvapi tau bandhamokṣau nityaikaparamārthavastuviṣayakau natarāṃ siddhau |
SA14n1187:446: yasmin santāne śubhoo vā aśubho vā cittānubhavaḥ samutpadyate,
SA14n1187:447: tasminneva kālāntare santatiparipākamāgamya mastuluṅgalākṣādirasāvasiktasantatiparipāka iva sukha-duḥkha-smṛtyādiphalodayo dṛṣṭāḥ,
SA14n1187:449: naiva khalu kaścidekaḥ kartā bhoktā smartā vā |
SA14n1187:453: tataśca yeṣu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratiniyataḥ teṣu naiva kaścid eko'nugataḥ bhinnāvasthaśca paridṛśyate |
SA14n1187:459: anyathā tayorubhayorapyavasthayoranupapannatve parasparokārakatvābhāve vā ākāśamiva kathaṃ tāvat tāvat sidhyet bhoktrādiḥ |
SA14n1187:461: itthaṃ pratiniyatātmanā sambandhena sukhādīnāṃ sambhavaḥ na tu sarvatra |
SA14n1187:466: tathāpi pratyaviṣayatvād ahaṃbuddheḥ pratyakṣata evātmā sidhyatīti cet ?
SA14n1187:469: ahaṃbuddhau pratīyamānatve yathā khalu pratyakṣa eko nityo vibhuścātmā svasiddhāntairukalpyate tathā naivopalabhyata ityavaśyameva draṣṭavyam |
SA14n1187:470: anyathā ahaṃbuddheryadi pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt tadā vivādamāneṣu tāvannaiva pravarteta ātmaviṣaye kaścana vivādaḥ,
SA14n1187:474: anādikālābhyāsavaśāt pratinīyateṣu rūpādiskandheṣu ekatvamadhyāropya paraṃ vyāvarttīyatumahamiti pratītiḥ,
SA14n1187:477: kathaṃ tarhi mama deha iti bhedamātragrahaṇamiti cet ?
SA14n1187:480: kathaṃ tarhi mama ātmā iti cintyate |
SA14n1187:481: atha vastuto'bhinne'pi bhedāntaraparihāreṇa tanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ śilāputrakasya śarīravad bhedopacāreṇa grahaṇānnāsti virodha iti cet ?
SA14n1187:483: ātmā khalu viṣayaḥ punaḥ kramotpattyā virudhyata iti paścāt vakṣyate |
SA14n1187:484: na kevalamātmagraha ātmā apitu tadviṣayo rūpādirātmā'stītyapi vaktuṃ na śakyate,
SA14n1187:493: nāsti pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca vyatiricya pramāṇamityanyatra vicāritam |
SA14n1187:494: bādhakapramāṇaṃ tāvannirākriyate- yadyevamātmā skandhebhyo'bhinnastadā skandhavat kṣāṇikaḥ syād athavā skandhāḥ khalvātmavannityāḥ syuḥ,
SA14n1187:499: atha skandhebhyo bhinna ātmā iṣyate tadā sukhādinā'sambaddhatve na sidhyet tasya bhoktṛtvādikam |
SA14n1187:500: tatra prayogaḥ- yo nāsti sukhaduḥkhādibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ sa nāsti kartā vā bhoktā vā ,
SA14n1187:503: ātmā'pi tathā'rthakriyādibhirna kathañcanāpi sambadha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ |
SA14n1187:505: tathā hi- sukhādinā hi sambandhe sati ādhārādheyalakṣaṇo vā saṃyogalakṣaṇo vā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo veti pakṣatrayam |
SA14n1187:508: tathā hi- adhaḥprasarpaṇadharmiṇāṃ jalādīnāmadhogamanapratibandhakatvena vyavasthāpyate tāvadādhāraḥ |
SA14n1187:515: sthiteḥ pṛthakatve sati sā naiva tāvatsthāturupakārikā arthāntarabhūtatvāttasyāḥ |
SA14n1187:520: anyathā tena bhaṅga eva tasya syānna tāvadavasthānam |
SA14n1187:526: evaṃ ca naivopapadyate tāvad bhinnārthena bhinnārthasya saṃyogaḥ,
SA14n1187:528: api ca, saṃyogabalena yadi ātmā sukhī vā duḥkhī vā bhavet,
SA14n1187:531: tata evātmanā sahaikatve sukhādinā naiva syāt kaścit sukhī vā duḥkhī vā |
SA14n1187:532: adarśane'pi balenābhyupagate niścaye tenaiva niścitaḥ syāttadā kiṃ tāvat saṃyogaparikalpanayā,
SA14n1187:534: sambandhibhedena bhinnāyāmapi prajñaptau paramārthataḥ bhāvānāmabhinnasvabhāve sati kathaṃ svabhāvabhedāśritaḥ pṛthagarthakriyābhedaḥ syāditi kumatiparikalpita evāyaṃ khalu sambandhaḥ |
SA14n1187:537: avikale hetau sati na yujyate tāvat kādācitkakāryasambhavaḥ,
SA14n1187:541: duḥkhotpādahetutvād yadi baddhastadā sarvathā baddhatvānnaiva muktaḥ syāt,
SA14n1187:544: aduḥkhāvasthotpādahetutvād yadi muktastadā vimukta eva bhavenna kadācidapi baddhaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ tāvat kalpyeta ādheyanibandhanaṃ bandhamokṣatvamiti |
SA14n1187:545: yadi caitanyādilakṣaṇatvenotpādasāmarthyena vā kartā syāttadā kartā eva sadā bhavet katha tāvad bhoktā ?
SA14n1187:546: atha sukhādyutpādahetutvena yadi bhoktā syāttadā bhoktaiva bhavet kathaṃ tāvat kartā ?
SA14n1187:551: na khalu hetumātratayā kartā vā bhoktā vā,
SA14n1187:566: ata eva yāvantaḥ paraparikalpitā ākāśādayo'kṣaṇikābhāvāste sarve arthakriyāsāmarthyahitatvād abhāvavyavahāraviṣayā ucyante paramavicakṣaṇairbauddhairiti |
SA14n1187:570: evaṃvidhe sarvasāmarthyaśūnye śaśaviṣāṇādyaviśeṣe'pi 'bhāvaḥ' iti nāma vyavahāre sati nāsti nāmni vivādaḥ |
SA14n1187:571: tathāpi arthakriyārthino hi prekṣāvantaḥ tathāvidhānupalambhasvabhāve vandhyāputrādyaviśeṣe ca bhāvavyavahāro na yujyata ityāhuḥ |
SA14n1187:577: vinaśvaratve sati skandhāntargatā eva pudgalāḥ prasajyeran,
SA14n1187:579: athāvinaśvaratve tāvat skandhāntargatadharmavisadṛśatvādarthāntarā eva te bhaveyuriti doṣo'yamuktapūrva eva |
SA14n1187:581: ataḥ 'sarve dharmā nirātmānaḥ' iti bhagavataḥ siṃhanādaḥ samastatairthikakuñjaravṛndānāṃ bhīkaraḥ,
SA14n1187:585: pāramitāyogamadhikṛtyāha- api tu khalu punaḥ ityādi |
SA14n1187:588: dānam ityanena trividhadānamadhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā darśitāḥ na tu dānamātram |
SA14n1187:594: prajñāyāścābhāve sa tad viparītatayā dharmaṃ deśayet |
SA14n1187:597: dānaṃ dātavyam ityanena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ kathaṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:598: na vastupratiṣṭhitena ityādinā'tra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamityāveditam |
SA14n1187:599: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam ityādinā vikṣepaṃ nigṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetannirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:600: tatra na vastupratiṣṭhiteneti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogasya yāthāvattvaṃ tāvannirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:606: tathā hi- paraiḥ paramārthataḥ iṣṭā vijñānavyatiriktā arthāstāvānna pratyakṣasiddhāḥ,
SA14n1187:608: arthe sati sākāreṇa nirākāreṇa anyākāreṇa vā jñānena grahaṇamiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
SA14n1187:609: tatra tāvanna sākāreṇa citravarṇādidarśanakāle ekajñānābhinnatvādākāraṇāmapyekatvaṃ prasajyeta,
SA14n1187:615: citrākāravyavasthāpanāyai anekajñānotpādaparikalpanayā'pi jñānasya viṣayaṃ vyāpya sthitatvād grāhakajñānānāmutpādo'pi na sambhavati,
SA14n1187:617: anyacca, sārūpyaṃ tāvadekadeśena bhavet sarvātmanā vā |
SA14n1187:618: tatra na tāvat sarvātmanā- arthajjñānasyāpi jaḍasvabhāvaprasaṅgāt |
SA14n1187:620: vyāvṛttibhedenāṃśopacāre'pi vastvādisārupyadharmāṇāṃ sarvatra vidyamānatvāt sarveṇa sarvamavagamyeta |
SA14n1187:621: atha tadutpannaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ cetyetaddvayena vedayatīti arthasārupyasya samanastarapratyayasyāpi grāhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
SA14n1187:622: satyapi sārūpye paramārthataḥ bāhyārtho na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ,
SA14n1187:638: anekatve saṃghātasya paramāṇureva sa syānna tvarthāntaraḥ |
SA14n1187:645: viśeṣasya kasyacidabhyupagame sa eva tāvat sākāratvābhyupagamaḥ |
SA14n1187:646: pratītisvabhāvamātre tāvad viśeṣābhāvājjñānātmani nākārātiriktaṃ bhedakamanyat syāt |
SA14n1187:649: evaṃ hi sati rūpaviṣayakamākāravijñānaṃ tāvat parīkṣāmarhati,
SA14n1187:650: tathā hi- na tāvat pratyakṣato'rthaḥ sidhyati,
SA14n1187:652: apratyakṣasyārthasya jñānasya ca kenāpi hetunā sambandhāsiddheḥ |
SA14n1187:657: na tāvat paramārthataḥ jñānasvabhāvatā pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati,
SA14n1187:662: na, tvanmate tābhyāṃ saha tasya kasyacidapi sambandhasyāsiddhatvāt |
SA14n1187:666: parokṣeṇa saha sambandhastu na kenāpyarvāgdarśinā grahītuṃ śakyate |
SA14n1187:674: ata eva paramārthataḥ bhāvasvabhāvasādhakaṃ kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
SA14n1187:676: ityevaṃ tāvat- yadekānekasvabhāvavigataṃ tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvam,
SA14n1187:687: tathā hi- anekasmin vibhajyamāne sati vibhaktāḥ paramāṇava eva syuḥ tataśca paurvāparyāvasthānaṃ na syānniravayavatvāt paramāṇūnām,
SA14n1187:689: tato diśaṃ vyāpya avasthitā na pratibhāseran |
SA14n1187:696: yathāsaṃkhyam anekavijñānāni yugapat pravartanta ityapi vaktuṃ na yujyate niravayavānāmamūrtānāṃ khalu paurvāparyāvasthiterayuktatvāt |
SA14n1187:700: sati caivaṃ kathaṃ te tatra bhāseran mṛṣāḥ |
SA14n1187:702: tasya jñānagatadharmatve sati mithyākārāṇāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantābhyāvaḥ syāditi kathamavabhāseranniti |
SA14n1187:703: tataḥ prakāśātmakākārebhyaḥ mṛṣātvenābhyupetebhyaḥ kastāvadanyaḥ jñānasvabhāvaḥ sadbhūtaste'vaśiṣyate,
SA14n1187:706: nīlādīnāṃ svasvabhāvād bhinnaṃ yadanyat prakāśarūpamiti sadbhūtaṃ kimapi nāti,
SA14n1187:712: tayostāvat tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattilakṣaṇo vā sambandha eva nāsti |
SA14n1187:719: ata eva yathā yathārthāścityante viśīryante tathā tathā |
SA14n1187:725: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam |
SA14n1187:729: yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīyaskandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayet |
SA14n1187:730: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān ||
SA14n1187:733: evaṃ dānādiṣu yathā yogastathā ādarśitaḥ, nānyatra |
SA14n1187:734: yadi paramārthata kasyacidapi vastuno bhāvābhāvād vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ na dātavyam,
SA14n1187:735: tadā avastvabhiniveśena tu dānasya kathaiva kā,
SA14n1187:740: tato vastuno'bhāve'pi tāvadabhiniveśo na yujyata evetyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:741: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena ityādinā bodhisattvena na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamityeva vistareṇābhihitam |
SA14n1187:745: anutpādādayo vikalpā api na karaṇīyā iti nidarśanārtha subhūte,
SA14n1187:750: ata eva na kvacit pratiṣṭhitena iti nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:759: prathamapakṣe kenāpi kasyacidapi deyasyābhāvāt puṇyābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA14n1187:761: bodhisattvaiḥ yo hi sattvārthaṃ śrama āsthitaḥ,
SA14n1187:766: anyathā kathaṃ bhagavatā'rthijanebhyaḥ putrādayaḥ pradattā iti sarvāṇyetāni codyāni manasi nidhāya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:769: ayamabhiprāyaḥ - samyagdṛṭivihitāni dānādīni suviśuddhatayā viśiṣṭeṣṭaphalāni abhinirvartayanti,
SA14n1187:779: ata eva anupalambhapratiṣṭhitāni dānādīni samyagdṛṣṭisambhūtānīti vipaścitsu prasādātiśayaṃ janayanti, nānyeṣu |
SA14n1187:780: tataśca dānādiṣvapravṛttatayā puṇyābhāvo deyādīnāṃ caikāntābhāvo neṣyate,
SA14n1187:785: tadā dānādiṣu pravṛttirnābhyupeyate prayogāvasthāyāṃ vyutthitāvasthāyāṃ vā kriyayopālambho na yujyate |
SA14n1187:795: tadabhāvānna rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamiti bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatarūpakāyāptikāmanayā dānādiṣu kathaṃ pravarteteti cediti codyamāśaṅkaya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādinā rūpakāyāptikāmatā sthānaṃ nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:797: lakṣaṇasampadā iti nimittamātrābhidhānena tathāgatasya nikhilo rūpakāyaḥ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtaḥ paridīpitaḥ |
SA14n1187:798: tatra lakṣaṇāni tāvat cakrāṅkahastapādatādīni dvātriṃśat padabāhulyabhiyā nollikhyante,
SA14n1187:804: ata eva tathāvidhe rūpakāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdeśaḥ |
SA14n1187:805: athemāni lakṣaṇāni paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvāni vā tadārabdhāvayavirūpāṇi vā bhaveyuriti ?
SA14n1187:812: etad vicintya subhūtirāha no hīdam iti vyaktīkṛtam |
SA14n1187:813: yadi lakṣaṇāni mṛṣā bhaveyustarhi kathaṃ bhagavatā tattatsūtreṣu lakṣaṇāni samupadiṣṭānīti cintayan tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭvaivaṃ saivālakṣaṇasampad ityāha |
SA14n1187:837: tatrānāgate puruṣeṣu pañcakaṣāyāṇāmādhikyādevaṃvidhadharmaratnasya atyantagambhīrodāraphalatvāt pravacanadharmakāye'nāptatvāśaṅkayā asti iti pṛṣṭavān |
SA14n1187:838: asti iti padaṃ tu kecit sattvāḥ ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti ityarthapadena yojyam |
SA14n1187:839: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyām ityatra śatānāṃ pañcakaṃ pañcaśatī,
SA14n1187:849: asmin kathane ' evam ' ityanena tāvad gambhīraudārye yojanīye |
SA14n1187:852: arthato'viparyayastasaṃjñaivātra bhūtasaṃjñetyabhidhīyate na tu śabdābhiniveśamātram ' ayaṃ bhūtaḥ ' iti saṃjñā |
SA14n1187:855: pratyakṣavad dṛṣṭavā bhagavān sūbhūtisaśayaṃ parihartuṃ bhaviṣyanti ityāha |
SA14n1187:860: yathā vā bhūtasaṃjñayā saṃjñitāstān bhagavān paridīpitaṃvān |
SA14n1187:861: śīlavantaḥ guṇavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca ityanena tu kramaśo'dhiśīlādhicittādhiprajñāśceti śikṣātrayapratiprattisamanvitāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ |
SA14n1187:864: kleśavati paścimakāle tu kathaṃ tathāvidhaśīlādiguṇavanto bhaviṣyantīti cintayitvā sūbhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:867: avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ tāvadavavādamanuśāsanīṃ ca śirasādāya śīlādiguṇasampadbhyaḥ prayatnavanto draṣṭavyāḥ |
SA14n1187:868: teṣāṃ tato'pi bahutaraṃ puṇyamabhidhātuṃ anekabuddhaśatasahasraḥ ityuktam |
SA14n1187:875: anyathā sarveṣāṃ jñānāt jñānāt sarvajño bhagavāniti deśanayā ko viśeṣo darśito bhavet,
SA14n1187:876: athavā tatteṣāṃ bhavyatvaṃ yat tatpramukhaṃ kṛtvā deśanā pravartitetyavagantavyam |
SA14n1187:878: atasteṣāmaśeṣaṃ puṇyaskandhasaṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ sarve te sattvāḥ ityāha |
SA14n1187:881: ebhiḥ sarvairabhūtasaṃjñāṃ nirākṛtya bhūtasaṃgyotpādane chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitaṃ tathā sthānasyāsyaudāryamapi paridīpitam |
SA14n1187:883: te anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāḥ kathaṃ jñāsyanta iti jñāpakahetau paripṛṣṭe'tra teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:884: anena tavat yogasamāpattau kathaṃ pratittavyamityetat prakāśitam,
SA14n1187:890: yadi nāsti ātmādisaṃjñā tarhi kiṃ śrāvakādivad asti rūpādidharmasaṃjñā ?
SA14n1187:894: iti cintāyāṃ evaṃ nādharmasaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam |
SA14n1187:895: saṃvṛtau avicāraramaṇīyatayā dharmāṇāṃ sadbhāvāt saṃvṛtipathasthitebhyastāvad adharmasaṃjñā naiva yuktimatī,
SA14n1187:897: tanniṣedhānna kaścid dharma upalabhyate yatrādharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
SA14n1187:900: tadyathā satye'pi vijñaptimātre vijñaptimātrateyamiti vikalpayan na vijñaptimātratāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
SA14n1187:902: yadyātmādīnāmasattvaṃ tadā tatra tatsaṃjñāyā apravṛtau satyāṃ 'ātmaiva rūpamidam' ityādikaṃ nāmamātramiti nāmābhiniveśasaṃjñā teṣāṃ bhavediti matvā saṃjñā'pi ityuktam |
SA14n1187:906: yadyevaṃ tarhi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sarvasaṃjñāvigamād mṛta-nirodhasamāpannapudgalavad yogino'bhāva eva syāditi nāpi..... nāaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam |
SA14n1187:911: yad yogijñānaṃ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tat kenāvagamyata iti cet ?
SA14n1187:919: niḥsvabhāvatāvicāreṇa tadgocarībhūtānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyena nairātmasaṅgrahāt yā khalu vyavasthā saiva yugapadulambhanam |
SA14n1187:924: tasmāt sati nairātmyadvayāvabodhe teṣāmanekaśatasahasrabuddhānāṃ paryupāsanaṃ pratīyate |
SA14n1187:926: sa tu saṃsāre na ucito bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:927: anayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kīdṛśyā ca bhūtasaṃjñayā tat saṃjñātavyamiti saṃdarśitaṃ tadgāmbhīryamityapi ca paridīpitam |
SA14n1187:928: ātmādīnāmasattve teṣāmātmādisaṃjñāyā abhāvāt padasamudāyādibhiḥ ātmatva sūktaṃ duraktaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñaṃ kiṃ teṣu niyamena na pravartate ?
SA14n1187:929: naivam, yadi bodhisattvānā na bhavet tatra saṃjñā, (tarhi)
SA14n1187:930: ayuktayupapannatīrthakaradharmān parityajya bhagavaddeśiteṣu dharmeṣu tadadhigamāya kathaṃ chanda utpādanīya ityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:932: ayamabhiprāyaḥ - ekānekasvabhāvavicāreṇa yathā rūpādilakṣaṇadharmā na saṃvidyante,
SA14n1187:934: yatra dharmasaṃjñā tatrātmādisaṃjñā api niścayena naiva prahīṇā,
SA14n1187:936: dharmanimittagrāhakamanasikārasya tasyā eva manasikārarūpatvāt maitrīprabhṛtiṣu tattvamanasikārāsadbhāve nātmadṛṣṭiḥ parihīyate |
SA14n1187:939: api ca, bodhisattvānāṃ sā dharmasaṃjñā yadyavaśyamanutpannadarśanamārgaḥ syāt tathā sati tena kathamātmādisaṃjñā prahīṇā syāt ?
SA14n1187:941: ataḥ sarvametat parīkṣya sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet ityuktam |
SA14n1187:943: anyathā tayorbhinnākāratvāt kathaṃ dharmasaṃjñaiva ātmagrāhaḥ syāditi |
SA14n1187:945: evaṃ sati tattatsūtreṣu kathaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ parigrāhayiṣyate ?
SA14n1187:951: abhipretasiddhyarthaṃ kolopamadeśitasya lakṣaṇasya na grahaṇaniṣedha ityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:952: tasmāt ityādinā sa evārthaḥ padāntarai prayuktaḥ,
SA14n1187:953: yato hi sarvo dharmo'dharmaśca satya ityabhiniveśasya viparītābhiniveśatvād,
SA14n1187:954: yuktyopapanno ya āgamasamūhaḥ saṃsārārṇavottaraṇāya proktaḥ kolopamaḥ sa (yadā)
SA14n1187:955: pāraṃ gatvā niṣprayojanatvāt parityājyo bhavati, kimu (tadā)
SA14n1187:958: anyathā dharmādharmādikaṃ yadi satyasvabhāvaṃ syāt tadā paramārthaviṣayatvāt tadabhiniveśasya saṃsārapāragateṣvapi yuktisahaṃ syāditi,
SA14n1187:962: “ bhadanta subhūte kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyajānadbhirdharmā eva prahātavyāḥ,
SA14n1187:970: tena prasiddhaviruddhāḥ adharmalakṣaṇāḥ paraparikalpitā ātmādayaśca upadiṣṭāste'pi saṃgṛhyante |
SA14n1187:972: anena tāvad vikṣepaṃ nīgṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetad darśitam |
SA14n1187:975: tadā abhisambuddho bhūtvā 'bhagavatā sarve dharmā deśitāḥ' iti tadapi mṛṣaiva syāt,
SA14n1187:976: ata eva bodhisattvaiḥ tathāgatajñānahetumadhigamadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chando na janayitavyaḥ,
SA14n1187:977: ityetad vicārya jñānahetudharmakāyāvāptaye chandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityaktam |
SA14n1187:978: anenārthataḥ paramārthastu anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti abhisambuddha ityetayoḥ grahaṇamapi vipakṣatayā paridīpitam,
SA14n1187:979: tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tu tathāgatasya jñānahetuṃ jñānadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca pradarśite |
SA14n1187:980: anuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhādīnāṃ pratipattibhedena bhinnaḥ jñānahetuko'dhigamakāyastāvannirdiśyate |
SA14n1187:983: saṃvṛtisvabhāvastvevam- sambodhiḥ samboddhavyaṃ deśanā deśitavyamityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ |
SA14n1187:985: taduktābhiprāyaṃ saṃgṛhya āryasubhūtisthaviraḥ yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi ityetadavocat |
SA14n1187:988: dharmadeśanā ca na sta iti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ? iti |
SA14n1187:989: agrāhyaḥ iti paramārthastāvannirvikalpajñānagocaro'pi na bhavatīti uktapūrvam |
SA14n1187:995: nanu syuḥ sarve bhāvā agrāhyāḥ anabhilāpyāḥ,
SA14n1187:996: tathāpi svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt paramārthataḥ dharmasvabhāvatāsthitā evetyāśaṅkāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ ityāha |
SA14n1187:997: sarvabhāvānāṃ paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parinirvṛttatvānna sambhavati svalakṣaṇadhārakatvam |
SA14n1187:998: yadyevaṃ tarhi bhagavatā abhāvo'bhisambuddho draṣṭavya iti vicārya nādharmaḥ ityuktam |
SA14n1187:999: sa tu prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvaḥ anena tāvat yogasamāpattiṃ nirdiśya adhyāropo'pavādāntaśca nirastau |
SA14n1187:1011: abhisandhāya tathāgatena asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā āryaśrāvakā iti deśitam,
SA14n1187:1025: bhāvagrahaṇābhāvena tadabhāvarūpatve sati bhāvagrāha eva tāvat prasajyate |
SA14n1187:1026: ata eva āryasandhinirmocanasūtre uktam - 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro'rthaḥ' iti |
SA14n1187:1032: ataḥ abhāvarūpatvena dharmeṣu sattvādatattvameva svabhāvena tat |
SA14n1187:1036: ata eva teṣu āryasandhinirmocanādiṣu- ' na tattvasya bhāvāditaro'rthaḥ ' ityuktam |
SA14n1187:1037: ata eva na dharmo nādharmaḥ ityuvāca |
SA14n1187:1042: yadi bhagavato'bhisambodhirvā dharmadeśanā vā nāsti kaściod dharmaḥ,
SA14n1187:1043: kathaṃ tarhi bodhisattvena puṇyahetudharmakāyaṃ prāptukāmena saddharmaparigrahe'nupravartitavyamiti vicintya puṇyahetudharmakayakāmatācchandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityuktam |
SA14n1187:1048: tato nidānam iti ratnadānānāṃ nidānāt tataḥ puṇyodbhavaḥ,
SA14n1187:1062: prajñaptisattvāt skandhānāṃ na puṇyaskandho bhāvarūpeṇa sambhavati |
SA14n1187:1064: bhāvānāṃ sthiratvena abhisaṃskāreṇa apravṛttatvāt cittamapi prajñaptisanmātrameva |
SA14n1187:1065: ekānekasvabhāvena pratisvaṃ parīkṣāyāṃ mithyaiva tāvat svabhāvaḥ |
SA14n1187:1066: ata eva na puṇyaskandhaḥ paramārthato vidyate |
SA14n1187:1079: tena ca bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti āvedituṃ bhagavatā yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyuktam |
SA14n1187:1080: anena tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukādhigamakāyasya pravacanakāyato nirjātatvāt tataścatuṣpādikāyāmapi gāthāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ (yadā)
SA14n1187:1082: tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukadharmakāyasya tu kathaiva keti nirdiśyate |
SA14n1187:1085: etena paramārthataḥ dharmadeśanāyāḥ abhisambuddhasya cāpyasattve saṃvṛtau tāvat puṇyakāyadeśanāyāḥ sattvāt bodhisattvaiḥ puṇyamadhigāntuṃ pravartayitavyamevetyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1088: ṣaṭpādikāyā gāthāyāḥ sattve'pi catuṣpādikā iti viśeṣīkṛtā |
SA14n1187:1098: kimiti śraddheyamātramuta yuktito'vagamyamiti manasi kṛtvā tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1099: iti pṛcchāyām ato nirjātā hi subhūte,
SA14n1187:1101: evaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyam iti tacca bṛhatphalatvāttat bahutaraṃ puṇyam,
SA14n1187:1103: ratnanirjātaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ tu mahāparibhogādi gauṇasāaṃsārikaṃ phalaṃ prāpayati |
SA14n1187:1106: dharmadānena tāvadakṣayāpratimatathāgatapadaprāpteḥ tanmahattvaṃ kimiti na prasaktam ?
SA14n1187:1107: yathā dharmeṇānugraho na tathā ratnaiḥ pareṣāmanugrahaḥ |
SA14n1187:1108: tathā hi parebhyaḥ samprakāśitena kramaśo'nena dharmeṇa kṣiprameva buddhatvapadaṃ labhyate,
SA14n1187:1110: ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ |
SA14n1187:1113: tāni tāvad daśa caritāni- lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ dānaṃ vācanaṃ śravaṇam udgrahaṇam samprakāśanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ cintanaṃ bhāvanā ceti |
SA14n1187:1114: ato nirjātāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti saṃvṛtau etānyāśritya buddhāḥ prajñaptā iti vākyaśeṣaḥ paramārthatastu bodhiḥ buddhaśca bhinnau na staḥ |
SA14n1187:1115: anena tāvat puṇyasya paramavaiśiṣṭayaparidīpanena tadutpādayituṃ chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam |
SA14n1187:1116: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpāda eva tadā sarve buddhadharmā apyanutpannā eva bhaveyuḥ tatkatham ato nirjātā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti ?
SA14n1187:1117: na buddhānāṃ bodherbhinnatvamiti vicārya tatkasya heto ?
SA14n1187:1120: buddhaprajñaptihetukā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhilakṣaṇā dharmā eva hi buddhadharmāḥ |
SA14n1187:1122: apitu prajñaptihetutvād ato nirjātā buddhaḥ ityuktamityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1124: saṃvṛtimāśritya tathāgatānāmanusamyaksaṃbodhistu ato nirjātā ityādinā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
SA14n1187:1126: ata eva tattaditarapakṣebhyaḥ buddhadharmā iti paramārthato naiva vaktuṃ śakyate |
SA14n1187:1129: atra kecidāhuḥ kathaṃ tridhā bhinno'yaṃ dharmakāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1131: prajñaptyā ca pravacanasvabhāvo dharmakāya iti ced ?
SA14n1187:1132: tathā sati rūpakāyo'pi tatprāpteranurūpahetutvāt tatprāpakahetutvācca dharmakāyaḥ syāditi |
SA14n1187:1134: bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ dharmakāyastu pariśuddhajñānasvabhāvastathā yā ca tasya sāmānyadharmatā,
SA14n1187:1137: na cātra pravacanapuṇyayorupacāreṇa dharmaḥ iti deśanā'pi |
SA14n1187:1141: svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmā iti yat vyākhyātaṃ tat sarvadharmasādhāraṇamiti na rūpakāyastathāgatatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA14n1187:1143: prajñaptita ityucyamāne'pi na rūpakāyo dharmakāyatvena prasakto bhavati,
SA14n1187:1145: buddhānāṃ rūpikāyo hi puṇyaṃ sambhṛtya jāyate |
SA14n1187:1150: sambhāralakṣaṇapuṇyanicayasyāpi tatprāptihetutvāt prajñaptyā dharmakāya ityucyamāno'pi yujyata eveti alamadhikena |
SA14n1187:1151: anyat kucodyaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ veti vicakṣaṇairviveciyiṣyata iti matvā padabāhulyabhiyā na likhyate |
SA14n1187:1153: itaḥ paraṃ dvādaśavipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣāṇi dvādaśasthānāni yathākramaṃ veditavyāni |
SA14n1187:1168: tatra bhagavatā dharmapudgalayorvistareṇa nairātmye deśite'pi anādikālīnadṛḍhātmābhiniveśasañcayabalena yadi kaścidevaṃ manyeta- yasya sattvādisaṃjñā pravartate,
SA14n1187:1170: evaṃ tarhi yaduktaṃ bhagavatā 'tasmin kāle'haṃ vīradatto nāma nṛpo'bhavam,
SA14n1187:1171: ' yuṣmabhyaṃ mayā dharmo deśayiṣyate ityādi kathaṃ syāt |
SA14n1187:1172: (ataḥ) sattvasaṃjñādivirahasya naivamabhiprāya iti vighnabhūtābhimānavisaṃyogārthaṃ pañcamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi |
SA14n1187:1173: asyāyamatra sāmānyato'rthaḥ- ye mama mṛduśrāvakāḥ srotaāpannatvādiṣu dharmanairātmyānadhigamād aprāptarasānubhavāḥ,
SA14n1187:1174: teṣāmapi ahantvena mamatvena cābhiniveśo na bhavati,
SA14n1187:1176: tasmin kāle'ham..... ityādi yattallokena saha vyavahāraprajñaptyarthaṃ parasantānavyavacchedamātrajñāpanārthaṃ vā,
SA14n1187:1179: tattvajñānasthitaiḥ na śakyate tāvallokena saha vyavahartum |
SA14n1187:1184: tasya ca kartari karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ cābhiniveśaprahāṇena idampratyayatādhigamānnairātmyādhigamo darśitaḥ |
SA14n1187:1188: ityanena tāvadarthataḥ mayā prāptamiti vipakṣatvena paridītyate |
SA14n1187:1189: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā prāptam ityanena apalakṣaṇamātrapradarśanena sarveṣāmabhimānānāṃ praheyatvaṃ pradarśaye |
SA14n1187:1191: āryasubhūtirapi bhagavato'bhiprāyaṃ nirdiśan paramārthasthāpannārthaṃ tatra yogasamāpattiṃ ca grahītuṃ na hi sa bhagavan kañcid (dharmaṃ)
SA14n1187:1202: sthiterabhāvāt kenāpi kathamapi tanna prāptuṃ śakyate |
SA14n1187:1203: yasmin santāne nairātmyamārgalakṣaṇahetusannihitatayā kleśamutpādātyantaviruddhāśrayalakṣaṇaṃ phalamutpadyata iti phalaṃ prāptyata ityevamucyate,
SA14n1187:1205: api ca, prāpyaprāpakabhāvaḥ khalu bhinnakālikaḥ samakāliko vā syāt |
SA14n1187:1206: tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ dvayorapi sthitatvāt,
SA14n1187:1220: idaṃ prāpyamidañca prāpakamiti niścayo na bhavatī |
SA14n1187:1222: teṣāṃ sarvātmanā saṃyoge sati ekatvaṃ prasajyate,
SA14n1187:1225: nairantaryeṇāvasthāne'pi na bhavituṃ śaknoti ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt |
SA14n1187:1232: śeṣeṇa rūpādinā ca dharmāyatanaikadeśena ca saṃskṛtā nirdiśyante |
SA14n1187:1237: yadi mayā prāptamityabhiniveśastadā kathaṃ nocyeta srota āpanna iti vicintya saced bhagavan ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:1241: sa pṛthagjana iti kathaṃ syāt srota-āpanna ityabhisandhiḥ |
SA14n1187:1246: amumevārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntare prapañcya nirdeṣṭuṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:1254: na hi sa kaścid dharmo yo'rhannāma prahīṇatathāvidhakleśāvaraṇajñānasantatau upacaritatvāt,
SA14n1187:1255: santateśca prajñaptau sattvānna sa kaścana paramārthataḥ,
SA14n1187:1257: sāmpratam āryasubhūtiḥ 'ahaṃ' padaprayojyamātmānamadhikṛtya viśiṣṭatvena araṇāvihārīti sādhāraṇaguṇatvena arhanniti ca 'ahamasmi' ityanenoktvā cittapragrahamātraṃ darśayituṃ aham ityādyavocat |
SA14n1187:1259: atra cobhatobhāgavimuktatvamarhattvamālambya taditareṣu raṇā notpādyanta iti vicintya yogaḥ samāpadyate |
SA14n1187:1260: tato vyutthāya tamālambya taditareṣu nopajāyante raṇāḥ |
SA14n1187:1263: na māṃ vyākariṣyat iti tadā aprahīṇatvādātmadṛṣṭermayā srota-āpattiphalamapi durlabham,
SA14n1187:1265: kathamaraṇāyāṃ vihartavyamiti cintāyāṃ na kvacid viharati ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1266: prāptaṃ mayā kiñcat saṃkṛtamaṃskṛtaṃ vetyevamabhiniveśena yo'sthitaḥ,
SA14n1187:1269: adhunā ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA14n1187:1270: ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena,
SA14n1187:1275: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,
SA14n1187:1276: bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kathaṃ tathāgatadīpaṅkarasyāntikād dharma udgṛhītaḥ ?
SA14n1187:1278: tadā'smābhirdharmamudgrahītukāmaiḥ kathamārādhanīstathāgatotpāda iti ye parikalpayanti teṣāmalpaśrutatvapratibandhāpākaraṇārtha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sthānamadhikṛtyāha- asti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ ? iti |
SA14n1187:1279: subhūtirapi prāgevābhiprāyaṃ viditvā no hīdam ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1280: nāsti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasya prāpyaprāpakatvena udgrahaṇaṃ nāma,
SA14n1187:1282: 'sarve dharmāḥ prakṛtyā śāntāḥ' tathāpi tathāgatānubhāvena nānāpadasamudāyādīnāṃ jñānāvabhāsotpādamatre udgṛhītaḥ ityupacaryate,
SA14n1187:1284: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ ' ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA14n1187:1288: 'nāsti sa kaścid dharma udgṛhītaḥ ' ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatra yogasamāpattiḥ vikṣepanigrahaśca nirdiṣṭau |
SA14n1187:1291: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ praṇidadhatīti tarkayatāṃ teṣāṃ hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāvibandhasaṃyogārthaṃ saptamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvaḥ iti |
SA14n1187:1294: bhagavān bodhisattvānāṃ tattatkṣetrapariśuddhisampadaṃ kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1297: avyūhāste iti paramāṇubhirābdho'vayavibhūto vā nāsti kaścid vyūhaḥ paramārthata ityavyūhā eva te,
SA14n1187:1298: tathāpi svapnopalabdhakṣetravyūhavad avicāraramaṇīyamātra saṃvṛtisattvamuktaṃ tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ iti |
SA14n1187:1301: evāṃ muṣitasmṛtikānāmupakārāya upasaṃhāropayena smārayituṃ tasmād ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:1303: kasyacidapi vastunaḥ siddherabhāvāt tatra 'apratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam' ityarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:1305: tatra vitathaṃ vadet ityanenārthataḥ paramārthataḥ mayā kṣetravyūho niṣpādyata ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena paridīpitaḥ |
SA14n1187:1307: hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāṃ prati chandaḥ praṇidhānamapi [ na karttavyamityapi ] nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:1308: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete |
SA14n1187:1309: tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA14n1187:1312: skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāsattve'pi kiṃ nābhinnā eva sattvāḥ ?
SA14n1187:1315: tasmāt sattvopekṣālakṣaṇavighnabhūtād visaṃyogārtham aṣṭamasthānamadhikṛtya tadyathāpi nāma ityuktam |
SA14n1187:1319: kimarthaṃ deśitaṃ bhagavatetyabhiprāyaṃ vaktukāmanayā tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1321: tameva abhiprāyaṃ vaktumāha- na bhāvaḥ iti |
SA14n1187:1323: svapnadṛṣṭa iva sa ātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ proktastathāgatena,
SA14n1187:1328: anyathā paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasyāsiddhatvāt tathā nocyetetyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1329: abhāvaṃ tāvad bhāvatvenābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ jaiminyādīnāṃ pratiṣedhārtham na sa bhāvaḥ ityāha |
SA14n1187:1330: abhāvasya tu bhāvavyatirekeṇa sthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ tadviparītasvabhāvo na syāt ?
SA14n1187:1333: tato'yamabhāvatvena deśitaḥ sumerumātraparimāṇo'pi ya ātmabhāvo yadā niḥsvabhāvatvāt paramārthato nāsti,
SA14n1187:1334: tadā kathaṃ parātmabhāvaḥ sasvabhāvaḥ sātmako vā bhavet ?
SA14n1187:1335: atrārthataḥ sattvaparipākāyodyamaratānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvābhiniveśaḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣatvena pradarśitaḥ tatprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe |
SA14n1187:1336: ' puruṣaḥ ' ityupalakṣaṇamātrābhidhānena aṇḍajādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ pṛthagātmabhāvānāṃ parigrahaṇamuktam |
SA14n1187:1337: na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityanena tāvat paramārthaṃ vyasthāpya yogasamāpattisthānaṃ gambhīratvaṃ ca paridīpite |
SA14n1187:1338: na sa bhāvaḥ ityanena tu vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA14n1187:1340: sampratyasya dharmaparyāyasya mahārthatvapratipādanena bāhyaśāstreṣvabhiniviṣṭānāṃ tatrānunayavikṣepaparihārārthaṃ navamasthānamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase sūbhūte ityāha |
SA14n1187:1341: anena tāvat caturbhiḥ prakārairasya dharmaparyāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ paridīpyatepuṇyaparigrahaḥ,
SA14n1187:1345: tatra puṇyaparigrahastu yadāha tato nidānaṃ bahupuṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt iti |
SA14n1187:1346: devādibhiḥ satkārastu yadāha sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ caityabhūtyabhūto bhaved iti |
SA14n1187:1347: duṣkarakṛtyavidhānaṃ tu yadāha parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti iti |
SA14n1187:1348: tathāgatāditulyatākaraṇaṃ tu yadāha tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ iti |
SA14n1187:1349: tatra ratnadānasya puṇyābhidhānaṃ viśeṣadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ paridīpitamvastuviśeṣaḥ kṣetraviśeṣaśca |
SA14n1187:1353: praṇītastu loke dūrlabhatvena khyātaḥ yadāha saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā iti |
SA14n1187:1357: yathā vastutathatā tathā bhāṣitatvāt niruktyā tathā ukta iti kathyate |
SA14n1187:1365: tatra pūrvaṃ tāvat parasya phalam athavā aparaṃ tu pūrvasya vyākhyānam |
SA14n1187:1366: deśayet iti śabdaṃ samprakāśayet iti chandam adhimuktimutpādayedityarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:1371: athavā ' bhāṣyeta ' iti padam ' samprakāśyeta ' ityartham |
SA14n1187:1374: yadaivaṃ pudgalanairātmyagāthāmātropadeśenāpi caityabhūtyabhūto jāyate kiṃ khalu punaḥ nairātmyadvayopadeśena ityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1377: vācayiṣyanti iti pustakagatam paryavāpsyanti iti artham |
SA14n1187:1379: cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā codgṛhītatvād yoniśaśca (manasi kariṣyanti) ityāha |
SA14n1187:1386: sa eva sākṣād dharamāṇabuddha iveti vākyaśeṣaḥ |
SA14n1187:1387: guru iti mañjughoṣādyanyataraḥ kaścit tatkāryasādhanāya dharmabhāṇakaḥ sthānīyarūpeṇa draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1394: tasminnanurāgaṃ parityajya dharmaṃ pratipattuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca darśite |
SA14n1187:1395: ito dharmaparyāyād ityupalakṣaṇamātraparikīrtanena bāhyaśāstreṣvanurāgaṃ parivarjya sarvasaddharmān prati yatna āstheya iti paridīpitam |
SA14n1187:1396: acintyasāmarthyanvitatvādayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ nāmamātraśravaṇenāpi parānupakarotīti sattvānāṃ puṇyotpādakathanāya āryasubhūtiḥ ko nāma ayam iti pṛṣṭavān |
SA14n1187:1397: kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi ityanena asyodgrahaṇenāpyaprameyapuṇyaṃ bhavatīti paridīpyate |
SA14n1187:1398: prajñāpāramitā nāma iti yasyā tannāma tattathā ucyate |
SA14n1187:1401: prajñā ca sā pāramitā ceti samāsaḥ |
SA14n1187:1404: sā cārthataḥ sarvavidhaprajñāsu uttamā tāthāgatī prajñā nānyadā prajñayā pāraṃ parimāpayituṃ śakyam |
SA14n1187:1411: tasyāśca bhagavatāḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataścānutpannatvāt sā śabdenābhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityāśayena vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1415: paramārthataḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataśca sarvadharmāṇām atyantānutpannatvāt ca sā na śabdenābhidheyā,
SA14n1187:1419: tasmāt vikalpapratibimbabhūtā yā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena deśitā,
SA14n1187:1424: tato bhrāntapratīteḥ sa vikalpapratibimbo naiva bhedenāvagamyate,
SA14n1187:1425: ato jñānasvabhāvatvena saiva paramārthaprajñā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityucyate |
SA14n1187:1427: athavā yā tāthāgatī prajñā pratītirūpatvena tathāgatena bhāṣitā saiva paramārthato na vidyate,
SA14n1187:1429: eva iti śabdastu apāramitā ityetadanantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1430: anena paramārthatvaṃ pratipādya tatra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:1431: yathā prajñāpāramitā vikalpapratibimbātmikaiva bāhyatvena samāropya bhagavatā bhāṣitā ,
SA14n1187:1432: tathaiva sarve dharmā api nānyathā tathāgatena kathitā iti deśanārthamāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte iti |
SA14n1187:1437: ata eva ca paramārthataḥ ' nāsti kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ' iti vijñāya sthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
SA14n1187:1438: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1439: anena vikṣepanigrahaḥ gāmbhīryaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe bhavataḥ |
SA14n1187:1442: tathāpi ye tāvad ādikarmikāḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti cintayanti,
SA14n1187:1444: atra dvividhena upāyena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti darśyate |
SA14n1187:1446: tatra yāvat pṛthivīrajo bhavet ityanena ekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt tanūkaraṇopāyo nirdiśyate |
SA14n1187:1450: ata eva paramāṇuvibhāvanāyāṃ sattyāmekatvaṃ prahīyata eveti |
SA14n1187:1453: te ca paramāṇavo'pi yadi digbhāgabhedena bhinnatvādasiddhā eva syuḥ, (tarhiṃ)
SA14n1187:1458: bahu tat pṛthivīrajo'pi yaḥ paramāṇusvabhāva uktastadekatvagrahaṇaniṣedhāt tadaraja eva |
SA14n1187:1465: anyathā paramārthastasyāsattvād anabhilāpyatvācca svalakṣaṇaṃ nābhilapyata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1469: evañcāntaśaḥ paramāṇūnāmapi yuktyā pratyekaṃ parikṣyamāṇānāṃ pratītāveva sattvāt pratīyate lokadhātūnāṃ cānekasvaviyuktatvam,
SA14n1187:1472: evaṃ khalu bhājanalokasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena niḥsvabhāvatvamṝ evamabhidhāya sattvalokasyāpyabhidhānārtha yo'sau lokadhātuḥ ityāha |
SA14n1187:1475: adhātuḥ saḥ iti ekānekasvabhāvarahitaḥ sa ityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1476: evaṃ yo hi rūpaskandhaḥ sa bhājanalokatvenābhihitaḥ,
SA14n1187:1477: śeṣāścatvāraḥ skandhāstu yathaikānekasvabhāvena viyuktāstathā pūrvaṃ vivecitā eva |
SA14n1187:1478: evaṃ sati paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarve dharmā māyopamā dṛśyante yogibhiḥ |
SA14n1187:1481: tatprahāṇārthaṃ ca chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe |
SA14n1187:1482: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau iti nimittamātrābhidhānena sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvabhāvanā sandarśitā |
SA14n1187:1483: arajastat iti adhātuḥ ityābhyāṃ paramārthavyavasthāpanayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tat paridīpitam |
SA14n1187:1484: tenocyate lokadhātuḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA14n1187:1486: samprati ye bodhisattvāḥ puṇyasambhārapratipattaye'tyantamupakāritvād bhagavantaṃ pūjayeyusteṣāṃ tasya (bhagavataḥ)
SA14n1187:1489: tasmāt teṣāṃ sambhārāsañcayato viyogārthaṃ ekādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi |
SA14n1187:1498: atrārthataḥ rūpakāye tathāgatābhiniveśaṃ vipakṣatvena nirdiśya tatprahānārthaṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi pradarśite |
SA14n1187:1503: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyāvagamopāye nirdiṣṭe'pi kāyajīviteṣvāsajya ye lābhasatkārādhyasitāḥ kausīdyalābhasatkārapiṇḍapātānuraktā teṣāṃ tatrānuraktivisaṃyogārthaṃ dvādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- yaśca khalu punaḥ sūbhūte,
SA14n1187:1505: anena cāsāre'nekaśatasahasraduḥkhaikasthānatucchātmabhāve tasmin snihyan etāvacchariraparityāgenāpi yatpuṇyaṃ na prāptam,
SA14n1187:1509: tatprahāṇāya saddharmasamādānāya ca chandaḥ praṇidhānañcāpi nirdiṣṭe |
SA14n1187:1513: āryasubhūtiḥ aśrūṇi prāmuñcat tadapi bhagavato'dhiṣṭhānenānyeṣu kusīdeṣu janeṣu adbhutamahāyānadharmasyābhidhānena paramaśraddhotpādārthe draṣṭavyam |
SA14n1187:1514: tasmād hastena aśrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
SA14n1187:1519: yataḥ ityāryasatyagocarajñānotpādamārabhya etatparyantaṃ dharmaparyāyasya paramapuṇyaphalasya yathoktā deśanā śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhanāmagocarā naivaṃ śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ | etena-
SA14n1187:1521: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā yeṣāṃ vīryamārabhya pravṛttānāmasmin dharme yathārutasaṃjñā bhavati teṣāṃ taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā parameṇāścaryeṇa ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1532: asatsu ca saṃjñeyeṣu saṃjñāyā apyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta,
SA14n1187:1533: tasmāt kathaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sidhyedityupālambhaṃ vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1539: ata eva nocyate bhūtasaṃjñeyaṃ bhūtasaṃjñātveneti darśitam,
SA14n1187:1540: yato hyavicāraramaṇīyamātrataḥ vidyate tasmāt tāṃ tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā,
SA14n1187:1543: kathaṃ ca vikṣepo nigrahītavya ityubhayaṃ darśitaṃ gāmbhīryañcāpi nigaditam,
SA14n1187:1550: samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ ye imaṃ bhagavan,
SA14n1187:1555: atrāyaṃ sāmānyena samāsārthaḥ - anāgate saddharmavipralopakāle ye bodhisattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
SA14n1187:1557: mayyapyevaṃ sambhāvanāyāṃ saddharmotthānakāle'pi yuṣmākametādṛśapratipattyabhāve idamatyantaṃ lajjāsthānaṃ tat syādityucyate |
SA14n1187:1560: bhāṣyamāṇam iti tu sākṣāt prākāśyamānaṃ bhagavatā,
SA14n1187:1566: taccaivaṃ nirucyate - pudgalanairātmyamātramavaganturmama bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sākṣāt śravaṇabalena yaddhi nairātmyadvayapratipādake'smin dharme prasādasampratyayamātraṃ jātaṃ tannaivāścaryam |
SA14n1187:1568: kalpeṣu asmin [ dharme ] dhāraṇādikrameṇa īdṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyamadhigamya paryavāpsyanti te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
SA14n1187:1572: etena kausīdyaṃ prahāya saddharmagrahaṇādau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamityādarśitam |
SA14n1187:1574: pratipattisampadamapi darśayitum api tu khalu punarbhagavan ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1580: yadyanātmādikaṃ sat tadā saṃjñāpi tatra niyamena pravartayediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1583: tasyā api parikṣā'kṣamatvādakiñcanatve sati ātmādyanubhavābhāvādasatyāḥ kā kathā |
SA14n1187:1585: nanu cāsattve satyātmādestadviparyayeṇa nātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyata iti kuta ityābhyantarotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vicārya tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1594: tasmāt buddhairbhagavadbhiryathā sarvasaṃjñāpagatatvaṃ śikṣitaṃ tathā bodhisattvairapi śikṣitavyam |
SA14n1187:1595: tasmād ye bodhisattvāstasyāmanuśikṣante teṣāmātmādisaṃjñā niyamato na pravartate |
SA14n1187:1596: evametat iti vineyānāṃ niścayāpādanārthaṃ svayamabhyupagamya bhagavatā dviruktam |
SA14n1187:1599: ataḥ prathamataramanārabdhavīryāṇāṃ teṣām anārabdhavīryatvāpanayanārthaṃ ye sattvāḥ ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:1602: mahāyāne tu tadapi dharmamātraṃ mithyeti deśitam,
SA14n1187:1603: tasmād anādikālīnasahajātmadṛṣṭisamprayuktāntaḥkaraṇā abhāvitātmānaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ śrutvā nāstyahamiti trasiṣyanti |
SA14n1187:1606: yad dharmamātraṃ tasyāpyasattve 'aho ! na mayā bhāvyam' iti matvā daśadigavalokanenāpi śaraṇābhāvāt santrāse tadapākaraṇāya na santrasiṣyanti ityuddiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:1607: cintākāle ubhayābhāvayogasyāśakyatvāt santrasiṣyanti ' kathamasmābhirnairātmyadvayamadhigantavyam ' ityādimasantrāsāpasāraṇārthaṃ na santrāsamāpatsyante ityuktam |
SA14n1187:1608: anye tāvannairātmyadvayānavabodhād yo hi trāso mṛdu-madhyādhimātrātmakaḥ sa ebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramamudīrita ityevaṃ manyante,
SA14n1187:1610: samprati lābhasatkāreṣu vītarāgatvāt 'te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyantīti |
SA14n1187:1611: ' śrotukāmānāṃ hitāya svayaṃ pūrvaṃ praśnamuthyāpya tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityavocat |
SA14n1187:1615: na kevalaṃ mayaiveyaṃ paramā paramā proktā,
SA14n1187:1616: api tu sarvabuddhairapīyaṃ parametyukteti darśanārthaṃ yāṃ ca paramapāramitāṃ iti nigaditam |
SA14n1187:1617: anena 'ekabuiddhena deśitamapi aviparītārthatvena gṛhyate sarvabuddhaikābhipretatve khalu kimucyatām' ityevaṃ dīpitam |
SA14n1187:1621: anena paramatvadarśanena hriyaḥ dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ nirdiśyate,
SA14n1187:1623: śreṣṭhastathāpi tvaṃ yallābhasatkārādhyavasitaḥ pramādena sthitastadatīva lajjājanakamityucyate |
SA14n1187:1626: evaṃ hrīsthāne deśite'pi ye duḥkhe'kṣāntyā vīryātiśayamārabdhuṃ notsahante,
SA14n1187:1627: teṣāṃ duḥkhākṣāntervyapagamārthaṃ trayodaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha apia tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādi |
SA14n1187:1635: ataḥ yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā saiva apāramitā ityuktam |
SA14n1187:1642: evaṃ paramārthato'nutpannatvāt nāsti tatra pāraṃ gatetyabhisandhiḥ |
SA14n1187:1643: anena tasyāḥ kṣānteḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ cāpi darśitam |
SA14n1187:1644: evaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhamanasikāreṇa kutaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntiriti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1645: iti jñāpakahetau pṛṣṭe yadā subhūte ityādyattaramāha |
SA14n1187:1654: nanu asatyāñca kasyāñcit saṃjñāyāṃ mūrcchāvasthāvad cittābhāvo bhaviṣyatīti cet ?
SA14n1187:1655: tatra nāpi asaṃjñā vā babhūva ityāha |
SA14n1187:1657: tacca kathamiti cittagataṃ praśnaṃ vikalpya svayaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1670: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante || iti ||
SA14n1187:1672: yena kṣāntibalena kaliṅgarājā eva sattvaḥ narakaṃ gamiṣyatītyabhipretam |
SA14n1187:1673: anena kṛtāpakāre'pi sati nirvikāratayā niyataṃ vyāpādādisambhavābhāvatayā ātmādisaṃjñāvyapagamahetutayā ca īdṛśyāḥ kṣānterjñānamādarśitam |
SA14n1187:1676: aṅga-pratyaṅga ityanena duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntiḥ me tasmin samaye ityādinā ca dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ |
SA14n1187:1677: anena dharmapudgalavikalpayorvipakṣatayā nirdeśena vineyāstatprahāṇe yathoktakṣāntyutpāde samyaggrahaṇe cāvataranti |
SA14n1187:1678: tadevam, vineyajanāḥ ' yadā bhagavāneva bodhyarthamevaṃvidhāṃ parāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvitavān,
SA14n1187:1687: sā ca kṣāntiḥ dvividhā dīpitānirantaraparāpakāraduḥkhaviṣayikā parāpakārāsahyaduḥkhaviṣayikā ca |
SA14n1187:1695: samastenānena asahyaprahāṇāt bodhau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamiti darśitam |
SA14n1187:1696: bodhicittotpāde sati na kenāpi saṃsāraduḥkhena spṛṣṭo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:1697: bodhicittotpāde'pi ātmābhiniviṣṭatayā trividhaduḥkhasaṃjñābhiḥ santrasya kadācit punarnotpādaḥ syādataḥ sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā ityāha |
SA14n1187:1699: rūpādyabhiniveśena śrāvakādivat saṃsāraṃ parikalpya tadduḥkhasantaptāḥ na kadācidapi bodhicittamutpādayanti,
SA14n1187:1701: rūpādiṣu satābhiniveśo hi tatra pratiṣṭhita iti pūrvavadatrāpyuktaḥ,
SA14n1187:1707: na kvacit pratiṣṭhitam ityanena rūpādiṣu nāmamātrasattābhiniveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
SA14n1187:1710: yaduta asatāṃ vitathābhiniveśasya prahāṇārthaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate ?
SA14n1187:1711: iti cittotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:1714: atrāyamarthaḥ - anādikālastaccitaṃ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśabalena rūpādau pratiṣṭhitam,
SA14n1187:1716: sa tasya rūpādivastuno'bhāvāt paramārthato na pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
SA14n1187:1717: tasmādeva ityanenopasaṃhāreṇātra dvitīye pakṣe pratisṭhitatvameva darśitaṃ bhavati |
SA14n1187:1719: dvitīyāsahyavastuna pratipakṣatvena api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:1721: te'pi sattvā yadi paramārthato na syuḥ,
SA14n1187:1723: kathaṃ te tathāvidheṣu mithyāpravṛtteṣu sattveṣu khinnā bhaveyuḥ ityādarśitam |
SA14n1187:1724: tatra sattvaṃ saṃjñāṃ ca pratiṣidhya nairātmyadvayamudīritam |
SA14n1187:1727: evaṃ tāvad yuktyā kṣāntiryujyata iti nirdiśya sāmprataṃ tathāgate sampratyayo'pi yujyata iti nirūpayan bhūtavādī ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:1734: yathā'nye buddhā bhagavantaḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇāni prahīṇavantastathaiva tathāgato'pyayaṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ,
SA14n1187:1738: tathāgata evāyamiti kathaṃ sidhyatītyāha- satyavādī iti |
SA14n1187:1742: atyantaparokṣārthastu sarvathā samyak kathayituṃ na śakyate, yathoktam-
SA14n1187:1744: ayaṃ satyavādī satyaṃ kena rūpeṇa jānātityāha- tathāvādī iti |
SA14n1187:1746: sa heyopādeyatattvaṃ sopāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ tathaiva bhāṣate'taḥ sa kathaṃ na satyavādī syāditi |
SA14n1187:1747: evaṃbhūte'pi taddeśitāni catvāri satyāni kiṃ tathaiva pratiṣṭhitānīti ?
SA14n1187:1750: na pramāṇabādhitāni uktānyataḥ satyānītyarthaḥ etena samagreṇa kāryakāraṇena bhagavataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam |
SA14n1187:1753: ekasyāpi bhāvasvabhāvasya paramārthato'siddhatvād ekamapi satyaṃ tāvad duḥsādhyam,
