SA14n1187:2141: aneneha bodhisattvena kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ tad vyapadiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2142: kīdṛśo bodhisattvo nāmetyatra yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2143: nirātmāno dharmāḥ iti dviruktayā dvividhena nairātmyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ darśyate |
SA14n1187:2144: bodhisattvo bodhisattvaḥ iti dviruktyā tadeva dvividhaṃ nairātmyajñānaṃ darśyate |
SA14n1187:2155: yadi nāsti bodhisattvo nāmaḥ kaścid dharmaḥ,
SA14n1187:2156: tadā tathāgataḥ pariśuddhadarśanena pariśuddhajñānena ca yukta eva na bhavet,
SA14n1187:2160: tasmād yasyāṃ saṃnipatitatāyāṃ pariṣadhevaṃ vikalpo bhavet,
SA14n1187:2161: tasyāḥ kṛte pariśuddhaṃ darśanaṃ jñānañcetyanuttaradvayamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2163: anena paramārthataḥ bodhisattvo nāma sa kaścid dharmo na bhavati,
SA14n1187:2164: tathāpi saṃvṛtau puṇyajñānasambhāraṃ paripūrya pariśuddhaṃjñānadarśanābhyāṃ yastathāgato bhavati, (tena)
SA14n1187:2166: anyathā saṃvṛtāvapi yadi sa na bhavet tadā kastathāgato bhavedityevaṃ tāvat darśitam |
SA14n1187:2167: tatra saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ ityeva tāvannocyate, (api tu)
SA14n1187:2174: pañcavidhaṃ cakṣuḥ kramaśaḥ- tatra sthūlaviṣayatvāt prathamaṃ rūpagrāhakaṃ kathitam,
SA14n1187:2175: paramārthavaśena saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pariśuddhadhyatītyataḥ pūrvaṃ paramārthasatyagrāhakaṃ paścācca saṃvṛtisatyagrāhakamabhihitamiti saṅgacchate kramanirdeśaḥ |
SA14n1187:2178: na tu pudgala iti pudgalaśūnye dharmamātre dharmacakṣuḥ,
SA14n1187:2196: evaṃ sati kathaṃ prajñāsyete tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣurādividyamānatā cittadhārā ceti cittāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityāha |
SA14n1187:2201: anyathā paramārthataḥ sarvavāggocarātītatvānna vaktuṃ śakṣyata ityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:2203: māṃsacakṣurādīnyapi cakṣuḥsvabhāvarahitānyeva uktānīti kathanaṃ prakṛtaṃ sākṣānnoktam |
SA14n1187:2204: atra kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamiti tadabhidhātumāha tatkasya hetoḥ ? iti |
SA14n1187:2210: yathā traikālikacittasya paramārthato'bhāvastathā pūrvamuktaṃ vakṣyate ca |
SA14n1187:2216: yadi nāsti traikālikaṃ cittaṃ tadā puṇyaskandho'pi na syāt,
SA14n1187:2218: tataḥ tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ sampādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvo yatnaṃ kūryāditi vicintya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2219: anena kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yo'ntaśo ratnādikaṃ bāhyavastu tyajati, so'pi (yadi)
SA14n1187:2221: kathaṃ na tathāgatasya asaṃkhyeyāprameyakalpeṣu duṣkarānekaśatānyabhyasyataḥ puṇyaskandhādhipatyaṃ syādityevaṃ deśitam |
SA14n1187:2222: ata eva paramārthato'satyapi puṇyaskandhe saṃvṛtau sattvād bodhisattvena tatra vaśībhāvaṃ niṣpādayituṃ chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitam |
SA14n1187:2224: kathaṃ na paramārthataḥ puṇyaskandhasattvaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti vicintya 'bodhisattvenātra kathaṃ pratipattavyam,
SA14n1187:2231: anena tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ prasthitena bodhisattvena paramārthatastadanupalambhena yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyam |
SA14n1187:2236: yadi puṇyaskandho naiva syāt tadā tathāgatānāṃ dvividhā kāyalakṣaṇasampad-anuvyañjanakāyasampad,
SA14n1187:2240: tasmāt tathāgatasya dvividhāṃ kāyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvairyatno'nuṣṭheya iti vicintayadbhyastathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2243: tato'yamatrāryasubhūterāśayaḥ - yathā paramārthato'skandha eva puṇyaskandhastathā rūpakāyo'pyunutpanna eva |
SA14n1187:2244: ataḥ paramārthataḥ na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityucyate |
SA14n1187:2248: tasmād bodhisattvena māyānirmitabuddhasya tathāvidharūpādhimuktayā tatpratipattaye chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam |
SA14n1187:2250: pūrvamadhimukticaryābhūmau rūpakāyāptikāmatākāle tathāgatapūjāsatkārakāle ca tathāvidho'bhiniveśaḥ parivarjitaḥ,
SA14n1187:2251: samprati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmau tathāgatarūpakāya- sampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ samprasthitasya bodhisattvasya rūpe'bhiniveśo bhavatīti yāsāṃ prasiddhistāsāṃ pariṣadāṃ durvikalpo nirākṛta ityuktatvāt |
SA14n1187:2252: evaṃ tarhi tathāgatānāṃ rūpakāyaḥ kasmād deśita iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:2254: na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityanena yojanīyam |
SA14n1187:2262: anena cāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam, (iti)
SA14n1187:2265: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ bodhisattvaiḥ karaṇīyānāṃ yatnānāṃ nidarśanena ādāryamapi dīpitam |
SA14n1187:2270: yadi rūpakāyapariniṣpattyāa na tathāgato draṣṭavya iti cet,
SA14n1187:2273: ato bodhisattavaistathāgatasya vāksampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ yatnaḥ karttavya iti vicintayadbhyo vāksampadamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2274: paramārthato vācya-vācaka-vacanānāmabhāvāt na tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā dharmo deśita iti |
SA14n1187:2278: vacanāni karaṇarūpāṇi śabdasvabhāvābhāvātmakāni vā tathā vistareṇa prāgevoktāni |
SA14n1187:2283: parāmārthasattvaṃ kalpayeyastadā 'kiṃ nu syāt' iti vicintya yaḥ subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2285: kathaṃ tadabhūtamālapituṃ śakyata iti vicāraṇāyāmāha asatodgṛhītena iti |
SA14n1187:2287: anena tathāgatasya vāksampadi pravṛttena bodhisattvena pratiśrutkādivajjñātvā pravartitavyamiti,
SA14n1187:2290: pudgaladharmanairātmyadeśakena bhagavatā nānāpadavākyātmikeyaṃ dharmadeśanā kathaṃ prasidhyati ?
SA14n1187:2295: bhaveyuriti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ? iti pṛṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2300: sarvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat pūrvameva vistareṇa nirākṛtam |
SA14n1187:2301: na ca dbitīyo'pi asati svalakṣaṇe ādhārasyābhāvena kasyacidapyasattvāt |
SA14n1187:2302: sāmānyadravyatvābhyupagame svalakṣaṇa eva saṅgṛhītaṃ syāditi tanniṣedhena tasyāpi niṣedha eva |
SA14n1187:2303: anyavyāvṛttyā sāmānyalakṣaṇamadhyāropitasvabhāvamiti parikalpite sati dharmadeśanāyā nairarthakyatvena siddhasādhanam |
SA14n1187:2305: paramārthataḥ svalakṣaṇasattve'pi na yujyate tayā dharmadeśanā |
SA14n1187:2306: sphoṭādiśabdasya nityasvabhāvasya paraiḥ padatvena parikalpitasya kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ tāvad virudhyate,
SA14n1187:2309: anityasyāpi tāvat svalakṣaṇasva na yujyate padatvam,
SA14n1187:2311: na hi yujyate anyasya saṅketo'nyasya ca vyavahāraḥ,
SA14n1187:2313: ata eva svalakṣaṇamapyabhidhātuṃ na yujyate, ananvayāt |
SA14n1187:2314: sāmānyapadārthe'bhidheyatvenābhyupagate sati abhidheyasvabhāvatvena tasya svalakṣaṇasvarūpatvānna hi pradeśāntaragamanam |
SA14n1187:2315: ekatvaṃ tu deśakālādibhinnāsvanekavyaktiṣvanugatamapi na yujyate tathā hi- (atha)
SA14n1187:2316: ekasyāṃ vyaktau sarvātmanā vyāptaṃ syāt tadā yena ekatvena parikalpitaḥ sa svabhāvastena anyatrādhigatetaravyaktibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ taditarasvabhāvastatra na bhavediti,
SA14n1187:2319: evaṃ yāvatyo bhinnavyaktayastāsāmekadeśena vyāptivyavasthayā tāvatīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ syāttadā ekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇena yuktaṃ bhavet,
SA14n1187:2320: bhinnavyaktiṣu deśakālaparimāṇādibhinnāsu tāsvekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇād yugapudgrahaṇābhāva eva |
SA14n1187:2324: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo'bhilapyate |
SA14n1187:2325: na sa saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā ||
SA14n1187:2342: tatredānīmevaṃ gambhīradharmo'yamanāgate kāle ghanībhūte kudṛṣṭijāle kathaṃ saphalo bhaviṣyatīti nābhiśraddhadhanti parivārāḥ |
SA14n1187:2343: ya evaṃ cintayanti teṣāmaviśrambhaṃ nivārayitum āryasubhūtiścittasampatsu smṛtyupasthānamadhikṛtya bhagavan ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2344: bhagavatā'pyanāgate'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca bhaviṣyantīti kiṃ noktapūrvam |
SA14n1187:2345: samprati teṣāṃ sattve'sattve vā ekāntenānabhiniveśaṃ deśayitum asti iti noktam,
SA14n1187:2347: paramārthataḥ skandhapudgalādīnāṃ satsvabhāvānupalambhāt na sattvāḥ ityanenādhyāropāntaniṣedhaḥ,
SA14n1187:2349: bhaviṣyanti ityanayā deśanayā bhagavataḥ kīdṛgaviparītasmṛtyupasthānamiti sattvebhyo darśayitvā bhagavatastasyāṃ smṛtyupasthānasampadi bodhisattvena chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2352: yadi na te sattvāḥ syustadā kathaṃ bhagavatā ' bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca te' ityādyuktamityevaṃ parivitarkaṃ vicāryaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:2362: yadi na syād bhagavataḥ kācidapi dharmadeśanā,
SA14n1187:2364: samyaksambuddho'pi tatastathāgatābhisambodhisiddhaye vyarthaḥ syād bodhisattvānāṃ yatnaḥ |
SA14n1187:2367: tebhyo'bhisambodhim adhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2368: āryasubhūtiḥ pūrvābhiprāyaṃ gṛhītvā nāsti saḥ ityudatarat |
SA14n1187:2369: tadevaṃ manyate- paramārthābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmadeśanā pratiṣiddheti |
SA14n1187:2378: pūrvamavavādaparyeṣaṇakāle bodhisattvānā 'abhisambodhi paramārthaḥ' iti yo vikalpaḥ,
SA14n1187:2380: idānīṃ buddhabhūmiparyeṣaṇakāle pareṣāṃ tādṛgvikalpanirākaraṇānna bhavati punaruktidoṣaḥ |
SA14n1187:2384: bhagavatā grāhyasvarūpasya svalakṣaṇasya sūkṣmo'pi dharmasvabhāvo nopalabdhaḥ,
SA14n1187:2393: sāmprataṃ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ api tu khalu punaḥ sūbhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2394: samāḥ sa dharmaḥ iti tadavabodhiteṣu sarvadharmeṣu pudgalanairātmyasāmyāt |
SA14n1187:2395: na tatra kiñcidviṣamam iti sarvatra tadaviparyayāt,
SA14n1187:2400: kena rūpeṇa samaḥ sa dharma ityatra niḥsattvatvena ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2401: anena sarveṇa kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2415: iti vicāryamāṇe mahārthadharmatayā prajñāpitatvena tatsattāṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte - ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2417: anantalokadhātūn ratnaiḥ paripūrya dānena yat puṇyaṃ tadapi upamāṃ naiva kṣamate |
SA14n1187:2418: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena sakalo mahāyānadharmaḥ parilakṣito bhavati |
SA14n1187:2419: yāvad iti vacanena sahasratamī kalā - ' śatasahasratamī kalā .......... upamā-aupamyamityetāni' saṃgṛhyante |
SA14n1187:2420: evaṃ mahārthadharmaprajñapanena hetunā bhagavataścittasampadaḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ānuttaryamavagamyate,
SA14n1187:2431: bhagavato lokottarajñānāvasthāyāṃ sattvasaṃjñā sarvathā na pravartate,
SA14n1187:2434: sattvebhyo vimuktayupadeśakāle'samāhitāvasthāyāṃ viśuddhalaukikajñānāvasthāyāmapi sattvādisaṃjñā na pravartata iti tannirdiśya avavādamahārthatvena prajñaptihetunā bhagavato'nuttaracittasampadaṃ pratipatsyamānāṃ darśayituṃ mahārthāvavādamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2435: praśnasyottaramapratīkṣamāṇaḥ sapadi svataḥ na khalu punaḥ subhūte,
SA14n1187:2437: tasmād bhagavataścittasampadastādṛśe mahārthāvavādahetau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2438: kiṃ sattvānāṃ sattve'pi saṃkleśahetubhūtatayā tathā nābhipreyate tathāgatena ?
SA14n1187:2439: āhosvit sattvābhāvāditi cintayatāmāśayaṃ vijñāya tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:2441: skandhātmakasya pudgalātmakasya ca kasyacit sattvasya paramārthato'bhāvād evaṃ nopalabhyata iti darśayitumāha- nāstiṃ kaścit sattvo yastathāgatena parimocittaḥ iti |
SA14n1187:2442: anena bodhisattvaiḥ kathamatra yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2443: abhāvaḥ kathaṃ jñātavya ityatra yadi punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2446: tasmād yadi sattvaḥ syāt tadā sandṛśyeta sa tathāgatena,
SA14n1187:2448: sa eva tāvattasya pragāḍhaḥ ātmagrāhaḥ syāt |
SA14n1187:2449: tataśca ātmagrāhahetutaḥ samutpannaṃ nikhilakleśajālabandhanamapyatidṛḍhaṃ syāt tadā rāgādyatipragāḍhabaddhasya āvaraṇāprahāṇena bhagavataḥ tathāgatapadaprāptirna syāt |
SA14n1187:2458: ātmādivastuna eva grahaṇaṃ syāttadā prahīṇāvaraṇasya tasya bhagavata ātmagrāhaḥ samudbhavet,
SA14n1187:2464: pṛthagjanā api kecit sacchāstraṃ śrutvā yoniśomanaskārasthitāḥ dharmanairātmyādhimuktāḥ satyamabhiniviśante,
SA14n1187:2466: bālamātrakathanāt skandhādyabhijñā api tādṛśāḥ pṛthagjanā anupajātāryamārgatayā bālā eva |
SA14n1187:2467: bālānāṃ vaiśiṣṭayamabhidhātuṃ vyāvṛtte'pyātmagrāhe bālatvena teṣvātmagrāha ityavabhāsate,
SA14n1187:2472: yadyātmā na syāttadā ke tāvat pṛthagjanā abhidhīyeran ?
SA14n1187:2477: anena sarveṇa tāvat sākṣād gāmbhīryaṃ proktam |
SA14n1187:2484: tadabhāve mūlabhāvāt kathaṃ bhaveyuḥ tādṛyastathāgatakāyasampada iti ?
SA14n1187:2486: tebhyo dharmakāyaparigrahamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2489: lakṣaṇasampadā tāvat paramārthavicāraṇāyāmavayavinaḥ paramāṇusaṃghātasya vā svabhāvenānupapattiṃ viditvā pūrvakamevābhiprāyaṃ gṛhṇan subhūtirāha no hīdam |
SA14n1187:2490: evameva upapattyantaraṃ bhagavatā sacet punaḥ subhūte ityādinoktam |
SA14n1187:2491: yadi tathāgato lakṣaṇasampanmātreṇa prabhāvitaḥ syāt tadā vakṣyamāṇahetunā tulyatvād rājāpi cakravartī kathaṃ na bhavet tathāgataḥ ?
SA14n1187:2494: tataḥ sa nocyate tathāgata ityapi na yujyate,
SA14n1187:2496: tena yadi tathāgato jaḍasvabhāvairlakṣaṇādidharmaiḥ prabhāvito'bhaviṣyat tadā cakravartī api tathāgato'bhaviṣyat iti cet ?
SA14n1187:2497: na, tasmāttathāgastāvad aśeṣavastusvabhāvasya yathāvadadhigamamātreṇa prabhāvita ityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:2498: anena tathāvidhaṃ jñānahetukaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ prati bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2499: adhunā paramārthatastattathāgatajñāne'pi nābhiniveṣṭavyamiti darśayituṃ dharmakāyo vyavasthāpyate |
SA14n1187:2500: bodhisattvena kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti dvābhyāṃ gāthābhyāṃ pradarśyate |
SA14n1187:2501: tatra pūrvagāthayā kathaṃ tathāgato na draṣṭavyaḥ,
SA14n1187:2507: rūpeṇa cādrākṣuḥ ityanena rūpe'bhiniviṣṭāḥ pudgalāḥ pāramārthikalakṣaṇādibhiralaṅkṛtaṃ dharmarūpaṃ pudgalarūpaṃ ca paśyantīti vyavahāraprajñaptirnidiṣṭā |
SA14n1187:2508: ghoṣeṇa cānvayuḥ iti māṃ śabdena evameva sa tathāgata iti jñātavanta ityarthaḥ |
SA14n1187:2512: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtāste janāḥ tāvad vitathāmārgasthitatvānna māṃ samyag rūpeṇa drakṣyanti |
SA14n1187:2516: atha kathaṃ buddhā draṣṭavyā ityatra dharmataḥ ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2524: sarvatra tathābhāvāt 'tathatā' tadālambanena sarve buddhadharmāḥ sambhavanti |
SA14n1187:2529: kimiti sā dharmatayā draṣṭavyetyatrāha- dharmakāyāḥ iti |
SA14n1187:2531: tenāyamarthaḥ - samyagjñānanibandhanā ye tathāgateṣu vyavasthāpitāste paramārthato dharmasvabhāvāḥ |
SA14n1187:2536: anyathā kathaṃ tallakṣitāste draṣṭuṃ śakyanta iti vicārya dharmatā ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2537: kimaśakyatvād aparijñeyā athavā parijñāne doṣasadbhāvāditi vicintya na śakyā ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2539: yadā dharmisvabhāva eva kaścit paramārthato na siddhastadā kathaṃ sā dharmatā'pi vijñātuṃ śakyate kevalayā svasantatyā |
SA14n1187:2541: yadyevaṃ samyagjñānasvabhāvānāṃ buddhanāmapi dharmiṇāṃ paramārthato'siddhatvānna syād darśanam,
SA14n1187:2544: ye paramārthataḥ sarvadharmiṇo na paśyanti ta eva dharmatāṃ paśyanti |
SA14n1187:2550: asatyapi tathāgatasya lakṣaṇasampatsvabhāvatve yujyata eva lakṣaṇasampaddhetukaṃ tathāgatasyānuttarasamyaksambodhilakṣaṇam,
SA14n1187:2552: bodhisattvasya lakṣaṇasampadaṃ draṣṭvā bhagavān anuttarasamyaksambodhau vyākṛta iti yeṣāṃ saṃśayaḥ,
SA14n1187:2554: yadi lakṣaṇasampad anuttarasamyaksambodherhetuḥ syāt tadā cakravartino'pi syādityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:2558: anena tāvat sakalena sthānena gāmbhīryaṃ darśitam |
SA14n1187:2559: saṃvṛtau cāśeṣavastusvabhāvādhimagalakṣaṇasya tathāgatajñānasya nirdeśena āudāryamapi nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2562: paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmabhāvād yadi sā dharmatā vijñātuṃ na śakyata iti cet tata ucchedavādī bhavān syāt |
SA14n1187:2563: tataśca tathāgatasyāpyabhāvād apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇamapi na sidhyatīti yadāśaṅkitaṃ tadarthaṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ apratiṣṭhānamadhikṛtya subhūte ..... evaṃ ..... bodhisattvayānasamprasthitaiḥ ....... ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2571: sarve dharmo avicāraramaṇīyatayā yathābhūtaiḥ pratyayairutpadyamānā abhyupeyante,
SA14n1187:2572: ato bhagavatā buddhena tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvāyāḥ māhākaruṇāyā nirmāṇādau adhipatitvamādāya punarvineyebhyo yathāvadupāyopadarśanena niravacchinnasaṃsārapravāho'bhyupeyate |
SA14n1187:2574: tathāvidhe bhagavatkāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti tadapi nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2577: tadā saṃsartā eva bhavatīti vikalpya saṃsāre'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2585: yathoktam ḥ “ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo'śrutavān pṛthgjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ,
SA14n1187:2592: sahetuke'pi nityahetuko vā anityahetuko veti vikaladvayam |
SA14n1187:2593: tatra na tāvat prathamo vikalpaḥ kādācitkatvapratīteḥ |
SA14n1187:2594: nirapekṣasya sadasadavasthāsamatvena sarvatra nirviśiṣṭatvāt nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt |
SA14n1187:2596: nityasya itaraiḥ sahakāribhistāvanna kaścit sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ kriyate |
SA14n1187:2597: kutracidapyanapekṣaḥ san kimiva krameṇa kāryamutpādayenna yugapaditi |
SA14n1187:2605: taditarānyahetau cānabhīṣṭe kathaṃ na nirhetukaḥ syāt |
SA14n1187:2612: na tāvad yujyate tṛtīyapakṣo'pi samānāsamānakālayoḥ kāraṇatvavirodhāt |
SA14n1187:2613: tathā hi, hetau sati sa phalena (kāryeṇa)
SA14n1187:2624: tatra taditarakālavyavadhānena phalotpāde sati vināśādevotpādaḥ abhyupagamyeta,
SA14n1187:2626: anyathā akārakasya vinaṣṭavastuno vināśāt kathaṃ (utpādaḥ) bhavet |
SA14n1187:2627: avyavadhāneneti pakṣe'pi yadi sarvātmanā avyabahitastadā tadeva samakālatvaṃ syāt |
SA14n1187:2628: niravayavayordvayorvastunoḥ sarvātmanā avyavahitatve ekakālatvātiriktā nānyā gatiḥ |
SA14n1187:2629: tasmāt sarvātmanā avyavahite sati pūrvaṃ yathā aṇumātrakam (iti prasaktam)
SA14n1187:2632: ataḥ paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā anutpannā eva |
SA14n1187:2636: 'kāryakāraṇayorāgopālaṃ prasiddhatvānna yujyate vimarśaḥ iti vādaḥ kathaṃ yujyeta,
SA14n1187:2639: na cakṣu pramāṇaṃ na śrotragrāṇaṃ na jihvā pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam |
SA14n1187:2640: pramāṇaṃ yadyeta bhaveyurindriyāḥ kasyāryamārgeṇa bhavet kāryam ||
SA14n1187:2641: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jadā svabhāvena avyākṛtaśca |
SA14n1187:2642: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva ārthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu kāryam ||
SA14n1187:2647: ato bhagavatā śālistambādiṣu bhāvānāṃ svaparodayo niṣiddhaḥ |
SA14n1187:2656: sva eva yadā nāsti paro hetuḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
SA14n1187:2664: anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāptatvāt mahājñānālokodayā labdhānuttarapuṇyaskandhā bodhisattvāḥ kathaṃ saṃsāraduḥkham anubhaveyurityevamāveditam |
SA14n1187:2669: tatrānutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiprāptyā bodhisattveṣu nāstyubhayavidho duḥkhahetuḥ,
SA14n1187:2675: kathaṃ vā bahutarapuṇyaskandhotpādamātreṇa saṃsāre'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sandarśitamityāśaṅkya punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2676: anena tāvad utpannapuṇyaskandhe'pi teṣāṃ mithyābhiniveśena puṇyaskandhaparigrahasya sarvasaṃkleśamūlaviparyāsasyāprahīṇatvam, ataḥ (te)
SA14n1187:2678: bodhisattvānāṃ tu anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpteḥ puṇyaskandheṣu nāsti satyābhiniveśaḥ,
SA14n1187:2681: tadayamāśayaḥ- tattatsūtreṣu bhagavatā 'bodhisattvaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ parigṛhṇāti ' ityuktam |
SA14n1187:2682: atra na parigrahītavyaḥ iti vacanena kathaṃ na virodha iti ?
SA14n1187:2683: bhagavānapi yenābhiprāyeṇoktavān tadubhayamapi darśayitumāha- parigrahītavyaḥ iti |
SA14n1187:2684: parigrahīta iti yadāha tattu parigrahalakṣaṇanaya upasaṃhāralakṣaṇaḥ |
SA14n1187:2688: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prārabhya audāryamuktam,
SA14n1187:2690: etena sakalena sthānena śāśvatocchedāntaṃ parihṛtya madhyamamārgo deśitaḥ,
SA14n1187:2700: tadā bhagavataścaturīryāpathena janmābhiniṣkramaṇādinā cāgamaprasiddhena kathaṃ na virodha iti yo manyate tadarthaṃ prasthānasampada īryāpathena prasthitimadhikṛtya api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścid ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2701: gacchati vā āgacchati vā ityetaddvayena caṅkramaṇam,
SA14n1187:2704: bhagavata āgamena paridīpitānāmīryāpathādīnāṃ yaḥ samyaktayā śabdaśo'bhiniveśastāsya viparītābhiniveśānna jānāti tathāgatena bhāṣitasyārtham |
SA14n1187:2712: tasmād evaṃvidhāyāṃ īryāpathaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti sandarśitam |
SA14n1187:2714: kathaṃ tathāgataḥ iti gatyā prabhāvita ivocyata iti cittāśayaṃ vitarkyāha- tatkasya hetoḥ ? iti |
SA14n1187:2715: na me sa bhāṣitasyārthamājānāti ityanena yojanīyam |
SA14n1187:2718: api tu adhigamena prabhāvitaḥ gataḥ ityasyādhigatyarthatvāt |
SA14n1187:2725: tacca gamanādi kvacit saṃvṛtāvapi na sambhavati,
SA14n1187:2729: tataḥ sa vastusvabhāvādhigatyā samastalokasya jyeṣṭhatvāt pūjanīyatvāt arhan ityucyate,
SA14n1187:2731: anyathātvena jaḍasvabhāvena rūpakāyastu tathā nocyata iti bhāvaḥ |
SA14n1187:2734: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya nirmāṇakāyamāśritya anantalokadhātuṣu apratihatagamanādipradarśanena ādāryamapi pradarśitam |
SA14n1187:2738: tasyāpi ekānekasvabhāvavisaṃyogānmāyānirmitabuddhavat mṛṣātvaṃ darśayituṃ bhājanasattvalokabhāvavigamāt prasthitimadhikṛtya yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2742: tadyathāpi nāma maṣiṃ kuryāt....... paramāṇusañcayaḥ ityanena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogāvagamena tanukaraṇopāyo darśitaḥ |
SA14n1187:2748: saced bhagavan iti vijñaya ekatvagrāhakanivṛttyupāyārthameva paramāṇuprabhedena (yaḥ)
SA14n1187:2749: sañcayaḥ sa ukto na tu paramārthato'navasthitatvāt,
SA14n1187:2751: tasmāt na bhagavānavakṣyat paramāṇusañcaya iti abhāṣite'pyevamākhyātatvāt |
SA14n1187:2752: anena tathāgatasya rūpābhāvatvena tādṛśyāṃ sthitau chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam |
SA14n1187:2754: api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet ?
SA14n1187:2755: iti kasmād bhagavānavakṣyadityāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ ? ityāha |
SA14n1187:2756: asañcayaḥ saḥ iti pūrvottarādidigbhāgabhedena avasthitānāṃ teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ svabhāvenāsiddhatvānna yujyate tattvataḥ sañcayaḥ |
SA14n1187:2758: asati ca digbhāgabhede paramāṇavaḥ paramāṇvantaraiḥ pūrvāparordhvādhodigbhāgabhedena parivṛtā na syuḥ,
SA14n1187:2760: bhāga eva bhavati paramāṇurityapi kathanaṃ na yujyate,
SA14n1187:2763: aniṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svabhāvena tarhi tvayā kiṃ sādhyate ?
SA14n1187:2769: ye paramāṇavastvayā niravayavatvena vyavasthāpyante teṣāṃ pūrvottarādidigbhedābhyupetatvāt digbhāgabhedenābhyupagamyante,
SA14n1187:2776: na rūpe naiva netre ca tayormadhye'pi na sthitaḥ |
SA14n1187:2777: yatra sthito bhavettatra na sannaiva hi cāpyasat ||
SA14n1187:2780: bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet ityanenaudāryaṃ cābhihitam,
SA14n1187:2783: samprati sattvalokābhāvaprasthitimadhikṛtya bhāṣitastrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiti saḥ ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2786: ata eva adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ iti pañcaskandhātmakaḥ sa sattvaloko'pyekānekasvabhāvavirahitaḥ pūrvavaduktaḥ |
SA14n1187:2787: anena tathāgatasya tathāvidhāyāṃ sattvalokābhāvaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2788: nirābhāsena tu yogasamāpattiriyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyetyapi sandarśitam |
SA14n1187:2789: idānīṃ cittaṃ kathaṃ pragrahītavyamiti darśayituṃ tatkasya hetoḥ ?
SA14n1187:2793: yadi sattvaloko yathāprasiddhastathā paramārthataḥ syāt sthūlaikasvabhāvastadā tathāgatena yathāsthiti vastutattvamadhigatamiti sa eva piṇḍagrāhaḥ syāt |
SA14n1187:2795: sa eva ca tathāgatasya piṇḍagrāho'tigāḍhataraḥ syāt,
SA14n1187:2797: na tvevam, ata evānyatra yo bālajanebhyaḥ piṇḍagrāha ātmagrāhasya hetutvena bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ sa paramārthato'grāhya eva |
SA14n1187:2803: vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti paramārthe'bhāvāt sa dharmastvanabhilāpya ityuktavān |
SA14n1187:2804: yadyevaṃ grāhyaḥ piṇḍo na syāt tadā tatra grāhakasyāpyabhāvāt kathaṃ vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti vicintyāha - sa ca bālapṛthajanairudgṛhīta ḥ iti |
SA14n1187:2809: anyathā yathāvastu vyavahāraprajñaptau kathaṃ te bālāḥ syuḥ ?
SA14n1187:2812: anena yadā sarve bhāvāḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvaśūnyāstadā rūpakāyaḥ jñānakāyaśca kathaṃ bhavet paramārthataḥ sasvabhāvaḥ ,
SA14n1187:2814: samprati yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādinā sarvasthāneṣu yogasamāpatteḥ kenopāyena sarvatra samādheyamiti tat pradarśyate |
SA14n1187:2815: evamanusandhiḥ - yadi nāsti piṇḍagrāhastadā tanmūlaprabhavāyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭerevābhāvāt kathaṃ bhagavān pañcasu dṛṣṭiṣu satkāyadṛṣṭimāheti tadarthaṃ yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2822: tatra yo hi kaścit subhūte ityārabhya tenocyate ātmadṛṣṭiḥ etatparyantamanena kathamavikalpyaṃ taduddiṣṭam |
SA14n1187:2825: bhagavatā tu pudgalanairātmyapratipādanādātmaniṣedhārthamāha ātmadṛṣṭiḥ iti tasyāḥ ātmadṛṣṭernirākaraṇena dharmanairātmyaṃ vyavasthāpyate adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityuktam |
SA14n1187:2829: evaṃ hi subhūtea bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena ityanena yo'vikalpakaḥ sa paridīpyate |
SA14n1187:2831: jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ ityanena yenāvikalpyaṃ tadabhihitam |
SA14n1187:2842: yathā na pratyupasthāmahe ityanena yo'vikalpastaṃ darśayati |
SA14n1187:2843: asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityatra hetuḥ parikīrtitaḥ |
SA14n1187:2847: tasyā mithyārthādhigamāvasthāyāṃ kathaṃ na syādavikalpa ityabhiprāyaḥ |
SA14n1187:2853: tatra yadi nāsti dharmasaṃjñā tadā tathāgatasya sattvebhyo taddharmadeśanāsaṃjñāsamutpāde kathaṃ na bhavet saṃkleśaḥ ?
SA14n1187:2854: kṛpayā sattvārthaṃ yāvatsaṃsārāvasthāne sati dharmasaṃjñayā kathaṃ na syāt saṃkleśaḥ ?
SA14n1187:2855: iti vicintya tayaiva cittasampadā deśanā'saṃkleśaṃ gāthayā ca saṃsārākleśamāvedayitum yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha |
SA14n1187:2863: anena yamānmahārtho'yaṃ dharmastasmādbodhisattvenaivaṃvidhāyāṃ mahārthadharmadeśanāyāmavaśyameva chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyaṃ tatparidīpitam |
SA14n1187:2864: bhāṣyamāṇāyāmapi kathaṃ na syātsaṃkleśa ityetaddarśayituṃ kathaṃ na samprakāśayet ityāha |
SA14n1187:2867: evamuktam - yathā vineyajanāstathā sarve dharmā ādito'nutpannatvādanabhilāpyāḥ tasmānna te kenāpi vyapadeśyā ityevaṃ darśyata iti |
SA14n1187:2871: ata eva tathāgato dharmadeśanākāle viśuddhalokajñāne prasthitaḥ,
SA14n1187:2877: sāmprataṃ nikhilaprajñāpāramitākāyaṃ vyavasthāpya gāthayā saṃsārāsaṃkleśo deśyate |
SA14n1187:2883: tatra pañcaskandhātmakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yathāpratīti pratītyasamutpādastāvad hetupratyayasaṃgṛhitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ ityucyate |
SA14n1187:2884: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ tārakāḥ iva draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA14n1187:2887: tathaiva saṃskṛtā api avidyājñānāndhakāre sati pratibhāsante,
SA14n1187:2891: vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ ca karmavartikaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehaṃ cāśritya prajvalanād dāpa iva draṣṭavyam,
SA14n1187:2900: yā kācid vedanā seha duḥkhamiti bhāṣitatvāt |
SA14n1187:2901: trividhaiḥ dukhaiḥ sarvā vedanā duḥkhā veditavyā |
SA14n1187:2919: tatra ye tāvadatītāste smṛtimātrāvasthitā ato niḥsvabhāvatvena,
SA14n1187:2922: pratyupannā vidyudaupamyena ekānekasvabhāvarahitāḥ agrāhyasvabhāvatvaditi tenānvitā vyapadiṣṭāḥ |
SA14n1187:2924: abhraupamyena ākāśasamacitte tadbījadauṣṭhulyena janitatvāditi nairātmyadvayaṃ tāvaddeśitam |
SA14n1187:2925: ato'nena khalu samagreṇātra bodhisattvaiḥ sadā sarvasaṃskṛtasvabhāvamevaṃ vicārya chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti paridīpitam |
SA14n1187:2928: gāthāyāmasyāṃ tāvadidaṃ paridīpyate- saṃkleśamulaṃ tāvad viparyāsaḥ |
SA14n1187:2929: ataḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāveṣvanekaśaḥ kenacid vicārayatā manasikurvatā apyevaṃ saṃskāraparijñānādyadā viparyāsābhāvāt na bhavati saṃkleśaṃ (tadā)
SA14n1187:2939: kartuṃ loke sukhaṃ śāntau bhave cāpyanadhiṣṭhitaḥ |
SA14n1187:2941: traiyadhvikānāṃ jananī munīnāṃ khyātā yathāśakti mayā tato jagat |
SA14n1187:2942: vipulena puṇyena viyatsamena vidhūya cāndhyaṃ sugatatvamāpnuyāt ||
SA14n1187:2943: ācāryakamalaśīlena mādhyamikanayena viracitā vistṛtā āryavajracchedikāṭīkā parisamāptā |
SA14n1187:2944: aṣṭamyāṃ śatābdyāṃ bhāratīyācārya mañjuśrīmitreṇa bhota-locāvā yeśe-demahābhāgena ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāmanūditā |
SA14n1187:2945: viduṣāṃ vaśaṃvadena ācāryapemātenajinamahādayena bhoṭabhāṣātaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ punaruddhṛtā sarvasattvahitasukhārtham iti |
